../data/lines/a02/a02-000/a02-000-00.png: MR. Macmillan has picked a strong " brains trust "
../data/lines/a02/a02-000/a02-000-01.png: team to negotiate terms for joining the Common Market .
../data/lines/a02/a02-000/a02-000-02.png: And he has abandoned plans to visit President de
../data/lines/a02/a02-000/a02-000-03.png: Gaulle this month to smooth the way . General
../data/lines/a02/a02-000/a02-000-04.png: de Gaulle's official welcome last week
../data/lines/a02/a02-000/a02-000-05.png: to Britain's moves towards the Six was
../data/lines/a02/a02-000/a02-000-06.png: taken as a friendly gesture in Whitehall ,
../data/lines/a02/a02-004/a02-004-00.png: So the idea of personal mission by
../data/lines/a02/a02-004/a02-004-01.png: the Prime Minister to Paris was dropped
../data/lines/a02/a02-004/a02-004-02.png: Instead Mr. Macmillan will rely on a
../data/lines/a02/a02-004/a02-004-03.png: hand-picked team under the leadership of
../data/lines/a02/a02-004/a02-004-04.png: Sir Pierson Dixon , Britain's Ambassador to
../data/lines/a02/a02-004/a02-004-05.png: France , to back Mr. Edward Heath , Lord
../data/lines/a02/a02-004/a02-004-06.png: Privy Seal , who is charged with the conduct
../data/lines/a02/a02-004/a02-004-07.png: of negotiations with the Six . At the same
../data/lines/a02/a02-004/a02-004-08.png: time the Prime Minister has offered
../data/lines/a02/a02-004/a02-004-09.png: Commonwealth Governments every facility possible to
../data/lines/a02/a02-008/a02-008-00.png: Seven Commonwealth countries have told Mr. Sandys ,
../data/lines/a02/a02-008/a02-008-01.png: Commonwealth Relations Secretary , that they wish to be kept
../data/lines/a02/a02-008/a02-008-02.png: in touch in London . Three of them - Canada , Australia ,
../data/lines/a02/a02-008/a02-008-03.png: New Zealand - will have strong delegations at an opening
../data/lines/a02/a02-008/a02-008-04.png: meeting in London on Monday . Once the Common
../data/lines/a02/a02-008/a02-008-05.png: Market's Council of Ministers draws up the procedure
../data/lines/a02/a02-008/a02-008-06.png: for negotiations in a fortnight's time , these Commonwealth
../data/lines/a02/a02-008/a02-008-07.png: countries can arrange for observers to advise the British
../data/lines/a02/a02-012/a02-012-00.png: The team is composed of experienced
../data/lines/a02/a02-012/a02-012-01.png: negotiators in several fields . Sir Pier-
../data/lines/a02/a02-012/a02-012-02.png: son Dixon has a wide reputation as
../data/lines/a02/a02-012/a02-012-04.png: his days as Britain's chief UN dele-
../data/lines/a02/a02-012/a02-012-05.png: gate . Second in command is Mr.
../data/lines/a02/a02-012/a02-012-07.png: tary at the Ministry of Agriculture ,
../data/lines/a02/a02-012/a02-012-08.png: Food , and Fisheries . The Foreign Office
../data/lines/a02/a02-012/a02-012-09.png: is represented by Sir Roderick Barclay
../data/lines/a02/a02-017/a02-017-00.png: Other leading members are : Sir Henry Lintott from
../data/lines/a02/a02-017/a02-017-01.png: the Commonwealth Relations Office , Sir William
../data/lines/a02/a02-017/a02-017-02.png: Corell-Barnes ( Colonial Office ) , Mr. G. R. Bell
../data/lines/a02/a02-017/a02-017-03.png: ( Treasury ) , and Mr. G. H. Andrew ( Board of Trade ) .
../data/lines/a02/a02-017/a02-017-04.png: They will accompany Mr. Heath next month when
../data/lines/a02/a02-017/a02-017-05.png: he goes to Brussels , headquarters of the Common
../data/lines/a02/a02-017/a02-017-06.png: Market Commission , or wherever the Six decide
../data/lines/a02/a02-020/a02-020-00.png: Some of the problems were reviewed yesterday at a
../data/lines/a02/a02-020/a02-020-01.png: meeting in Paris between M. Couve de Murville , French
../data/lines/a02/a02-020/a02-020-02.png: Foreign Minister , and Mr. Heath . MR. Selwyn Lloyd -
../data/lines/a02/a02-020/a02-020-03.png: a man with troubles enough back home - seems
../data/lines/a02/a02-020/a02-020-04.png: fated to fly into trouble abroad . Last year it was
../data/lines/a02/a02-020/a02-020-05.png: the riots in Istanbul , which enlivened the NATO
../data/lines/a02/a02-024/a02-024-00.png: Now we have the strikes and demonstrations in
../data/lines/a02/a02-024/a02-024-01.png: Ghana coinciding with the meeting of the Com-
../data/lines/a02/a02-024/a02-024-03.png: first to be held in Africa . Only a few hours af-
../data/lines/a02/a02-024/a02-024-04.png: ter Mr Lloyd and his 24-strong delegation landed
../data/lines/a02/a02-024/a02-024-05.png: at Accra this morning , hundreds of shop assistants
../data/lines/a02/a02-027/a02-027-00.png: The stores had been hit by the same strike wave
../data/lines/a02/a02-027/a02-027-01.png: that has paralysed the port of Takoradi for the past
../data/lines/a02/a02-027/a02-027-02.png: week . Root of the discontent : The austerity Budget ,
../data/lines/a02/a02-027/a02-027-03.png: including a compulsory savings scheme which the
../data/lines/a02/a02-027/a02-027-04.png: Ghana Government introduced in July . Ghana's strong
../data/lines/a02/a02-027/a02-027-05.png: man is not here to face the storm . President Nkrumah ,
../data/lines/a02/a02-027/a02-027-06.png: having made his contribution to the neutrals' conference
../data/lines/a02/a02-027/a02-027-07.png: in Belgrade , has resumed his holiday on the Black
../data/lines/a02/a02-027/a02-027-08.png: Sea and no one here professes to know when he
../data/lines/a02/a02-032/a02-032-00.png: But in his absence his chief lieutenants have
../data/lines/a02/a02-032/a02-032-01.png: not let him down . The strong arm of authority has
../data/lines/a02/a02-032/a02-032-02.png: been raised against the strikers and is now beginning
../data/lines/a02/a02-032/a02-032-03.png: to tell . Today's Ghanaian Times ( motto : " The welfare
../data/lines/a02/a02-032/a02-032-04.png: of the people is the supreme law " ) reports : " The
../data/lines/a02/a02-032/a02-032-05.png: Government has been urged to take immediate ac-
../data/lines/a02/a02-032/a02-032-06.png: tion to deal ruthlessly with the strikers . "
../data/lines/a02/a02-037/a02-037-00.png: The urge came from a conference of activists of
../data/lines/a02/a02-037/a02-037-01.png: Nkrumah's Convention Party " after powerful addresses
../data/lines/a02/a02-037/a02-037-02.png: by Comrades Krobo Edusei , Tawia Adamafio , " and
../data/lines/a02/a02-037/a02-037-03.png: others . Strong deeds followed strong words . In Takoradi
../data/lines/a02/a02-037/a02-037-04.png: a " limited state of emergency " was declared , giving
../data/lines/a02/a02-037/a02-037-05.png: the Government adequate power to maintain all
../data/lines/a02/a02-037/a02-037-06.png: essential services and ensure food supplies . Thus it
../data/lines/a02/a02-037/a02-037-07.png: becomes an offence punishable with imprisonment
../data/lines/a02/a02-037/a02-037-08.png: for anyone who " publishes a report likely to cause
../data/lines/a02/a02-037/a02-037-09.png: alarm or prejudicial to public safety . "
../data/lines/a02/a02-042/a02-042-00.png: And up to ten years' imprisonment can be imposed
../data/lines/a02/a02-042/a02-042-01.png: on anyone convicted of sabotage . These stern measures
../data/lines/a02/a02-042/a02-042-02.png: had the desired effect today at Kumasi where the
../data/lines/a02/a02-042/a02-042-03.png: strikers gave in , but in Takoradi , the chief storm centre ,
../data/lines/a02/a02-042/a02-042-04.png: they are still holding out despite the presence of 1,400
../data/lines/a02/a02-042/a02-042-05.png: police and 16 armoured cars . And how did the
../data/lines/a02/a02-042/a02-042-06.png: Government react when the strikers demonstrated in
../data/lines/a02/a02-046/a02-046-00.png: At 9.40 Mr. Edusei , Minister of Transport and pro-
../data/lines/a02/a02-046/a02-046-01.png: bably the toughest man in Mr. Nkrumah's team ,
../data/lines/a02/a02-046/a02-046-02.png: drove up to the Kingsway Stores and faced the
../data/lines/a02/a02-046/a02-046-03.png: demonstrators , most of them shopgirls in overalls .
../data/lines/a02/a02-046/a02-046-04.png: " If you have not dispersed by ten o'clock , " he
../data/lines/a02/a02-046/a02-046-05.png: told them , ' the police will act . ' At five to ten
../data/lines/a02/a02-046/a02-046-06.png: a posse of police arrived and in less than
../data/lines/a02/a02-046/a02-046-07.png: two minutes the crowd had gone .
../data/lines/a02/a02-050/a02-050-00.png: If the threatened " counter-revolution " was not * to bring
../data/lines/a02/a02-050/a02-050-01.png: the President back from his travels it might have been
../data/lines/a02/a02-050/a02-050-02.png: thought that the muster from the 13 States of the
../data/lines/a02/a02-050/a02-050-03.png: Commonwealth was an occasion worthy of his presence .
../data/lines/a02/a02-050/a02-050-04.png: After all it was Mr. Nkrumah who suggested that this
../data/lines/a02/a02-050/a02-050-05.png: year the Economic Consultative Council should meet
../data/lines/a02/a02-053/a02-053-00.png: It has been left , however , to Mr. Goka , Ghana's Finance
../data/lines/a02/a02-053/a02-053-01.png: Minister , to do the honours as host , in which capacity
../data/lines/a02/a02-053/a02-053-02.png: he held a reception tonight in Accra's Ambassador
../data/lines/a02/a02-053/a02-053-03.png: Hotel . POLICE , on direct orders from the Cabinet , are
../data/lines/a02/a02-053/a02-053-04.png: openly intimidating members of Earl Russell's nuclear-
../data/lines/a02/a02-053/a02-053-05.png: disarming Committee of 100 , the Committee claimed
../data/lines/a02/a02-053/a02-053-06.png: yesterday . It said pressure was being put on
../data/lines/a02/a02-053/a02-053-07.png: members and associates all over the country .
../data/lines/a02/a02-057/a02-057-00.png: It alleged : Phones were being tapped and
../data/lines/a02/a02-057/a02-057-01.png: going out of action ; Police were visiting
../data/lines/a02/a02-057/a02-057-02.png: people " on no pretext whatsoever , except
../data/lines/a02/a02-057/a02-057-03.png: to pass the time of day " ; Supporters had
../data/lines/a02/a02-057/a02-057-04.png: been warned - one that his connection
../data/lines/a02/a02-057/a02-057-05.png: with the committee was going too far ; another
../data/lines/a02/a02-057/a02-057-07.png: all right , but support for the committee
../data/lines/a02/a02-062/a02-062-00.png: A third man's house was watched for four days
../data/lines/a02/a02-062/a02-062-01.png: by plain-clothes men . Committee-member Mr. George
../data/lines/a02/a02-062/a02-062-02.png: Clark commented at a Press conference : " The
../data/lines/a02/a02-062/a02-062-03.png: most extraordinary things are happening . " Fifty
../data/lines/a02/a02-062/a02-062-04.png: committee members will appear at Bow-street
../data/lines/a02/a02-062/a02-062-05.png: today , including Lord Russell , Lady Russell ,
../data/lines/a02/a02-062/a02-062-06.png: Lord Boyd-Orr , the Rev. Michael Scott , and
../data/lines/a02/a02-067/a02-067-00.png: They are required to show why they
../data/lines/a02/a02-067/a02-067-01.png: should not be bound over for disturbing
../data/lines/a02/a02-067/a02-067-02.png: the peace and for inciting a breach
../data/lines/a02/a02-067/a02-067-03.png: of the peace . The summonses say they
../data/lines/a02/a02-067/a02-067-04.png: are " likely to persevere in such unlawful
../data/lines/a02/a02-067/a02-067-06.png: putting his affairs in order , and
../data/lines/a02/a02-067/a02-067-07.png: packing a case , at his Chelsea home
../data/lines/a02/a02-072/a02-072-00.png: " He is not going to agree to be bound over . That will
../data/lines/a02/a02-072/a02-072-01.png: probably mean jail and , though frail , he is very fit and
../data/lines/a02/a02-072/a02-072-02.png: will take the rigours of prison in his stride . He
../data/lines/a02/a02-072/a02-072-03.png: hopes to be allowed to do some writing . " Back at
../data/lines/a02/a02-072/a02-072-04.png: the Press conference , Mr. Clark said two committee
../data/lines/a02/a02-072/a02-072-05.png: members tried a " plant " call on suspect phone . They
../data/lines/a02/a02-072/a02-072-06.png: discussed a sit-down at Watford at 5.30 p.m. - none
../data/lines/a02/a02-072/a02-072-07.png: was planned but police turned up .
../data/lines/a02/a02-078/a02-078-00.png: Sir Roy Welensky said today that he no
../data/lines/a02/a02-078/a02-078-01.png: longer accepted the good faith of Mr. Kenneth
../data/lines/a02/a02-078/a02-078-02.png: Kaunda . Sir Roy , Federal Rhodesian Prime Minister ,
../data/lines/a02/a02-078/a02-078-03.png: said that Mr. Kaunda's United National Independence
../data/lines/a02/a02-078/a02-078-04.png: Party was a monster as vicious as the Zambia
../data/lines/a02/a02-078/a02-078-05.png: National Congress , which was led by Mr. Kaunda
../data/lines/a02/a02-078/a02-078-06.png: until he was outlawed in 1959 . The record
../data/lines/a02/a02-078/a02-078-07.png: of lawlessness among UNIP supporters went
../data/lines/a02/a02-078/a02-078-08.png: back a long way , Sir Roy told the
../data/lines/a02/a02-082/a02-082-00.png: He cited cases in which hundreds of UNIP supporters
../data/lines/a02/a02-082/a02-082-01.png: had been arrested or convicted since last year on
../data/lines/a02/a02-082/a02-082-02.png: charges of creating disturbances . During the first
../data/lines/a02/a02-082/a02-082-03.png: three weeks of the present trouble 287 incidents
../data/lines/a02/a02-082/a02-082-04.png: had been reported in Northern Rhodesia . More
../data/lines/a02/a02-082/a02-082-05.png: than 500 people - 167 of them members of
../data/lines/a02/a02-082/a02-082-06.png: the UNIP - were convicted last month in the
../data/lines/a02/a02-086/a02-086-00.png: " Against this background must be taken Mr.
../data/lines/a02/a02-086/a02-086-01.png: Kaunda's repeated statements that all he is
../data/lines/a02/a02-086/a02-086-02.png: doing is in the name of non-violence , " said
../data/lines/a02/a02-086/a02-086-03.png: Sir Roy . " I am now compelled to say that
../data/lines/a02/a02-086/a02-086-04.png: I don't accept his good faith . " He said
../data/lines/a02/a02-086/a02-086-05.png: Mr. Kaunda must know that his statements
../data/lines/a02/a02-086/a02-086-06.png: had stimulated violence , but he had done
../data/lines/a02/a02-090/a02-090-00.png: " It is true he made a point of again being absent
../data/lines/a02/a02-090/a02-090-01.png: from Northern Rhodesia when his followers have
../data/lines/a02/a02-090/a02-090-02.png: indulged in such violence . " But Sir Roy pointed out
../data/lines/a02/a02-090/a02-090-03.png: that a few months ago Mr. Kaunda said that
../data/lines/a02/a02-090/a02-090-04.png: if UNIP did not get its way what would happen
../data/lines/a02/a02-090/a02-090-05.png: would make the Mau Mau in Kenya " seem like a
../data/lines/a02/a02-093/a02-093-00.png: JOHN DICKIE writes : Mr. Macmillan gave top
../data/lines/a02/a02-093/a02-093-01.png: priority to the clash over Northern Rhodesia on his
../data/lines/a02/a02-093/a02-093-02.png: return from Scotland yesterday . He summoned Mr.
../data/lines/a02/a02-093/a02-093-03.png: Iain Macleod , Colonial Secretary , and Mr. Duncan Sandys ,
../data/lines/a02/a02-093/a02-093-04.png: Commonwealth Relations Secretary for an hour's talks
../data/lines/a02/a02-093/a02-093-05.png: at Admiralty House . A statement is expected today
../data/lines/a02/a02-093/a02-093-06.png: to hold the door open for modifications to the
../data/lines/a02/a02-093/a02-093-07.png: new Constitution provided law and order is maintained
../data/lines/a02/a02-098/a02-098-00.png: Its terms have set the Prime Minister an exacting
../data/lines/a02/a02-098/a02-098-01.png: problem . Mr. Sandys has warned of the risk of a
../data/lines/a02/a02-098/a02-098-02.png: strong reaction from Sir Roy Welensky to any
../data/lines/a02/a02-098/a02-098-03.png: suggestion that there may be fresh concessions to the
../data/lines/a02/a02-098/a02-098-04.png: African nationalists . Mr. Macleod has ample evidence
../data/lines/a02/a02-098/a02-098-05.png: from talks with Sir John Moffat , Northern Rhodesian
../data/lines/a02/a02-098/a02-098-06.png: Liberal leader , and Mr. Kaunda , that the bulk
../data/lines/a02/a02-098/a02-098-07.png: of moderates and Africans will reject the
../data/lines/a02/a02-102/a02-102-00.png: A ROYAL welcome for the Kabaka of
../data/lines/a02/a02-102/a02-102-02.png: Elizabeth Bagaya of Toro , kneeling at the
../data/lines/a02/a02-102/a02-102-03.png: foot of his airliner's steps at London Airport
../data/lines/a02/a02-102/a02-102-04.png: yesterday . Forty other Africans greeted him ,
../data/lines/a02/a02-102/a02-102-05.png: kneeling with heads bowed . The princess ,
../data/lines/a02/a02-102/a02-102-06.png: aged 24 , is now studying history at Cambri-
../data/lines/a02/a02-102/a02-102-07.png: dge , where she is a friend of Prince William
../data/lines/a02/a02-106/a02-106-00.png: King Freddie and three other hereditary rulers of
../data/lines/a02/a02-106/a02-106-01.png: native kingdoms in Uganda arrived for talks with
../data/lines/a02/a02-106/a02-106-02.png: Colonial Secretary Mr. Iain Macleod , before the
../data/lines/a02/a02-106/a02-106-03.png: Uganda Constitutional conference opens next Monday .
../data/lines/a02/a02-106/a02-106-04.png: The question : Their status in an independent Uganda .
../data/lines/a02/a02-106/a02-106-05.png: The thorniest problem for next week's conference is
../data/lines/a02/a02-106/a02-106-06.png: to settle the relationships between them and the
../data/lines/a02/a02-106/a02-106-07.png: rest of the country . A Government report has
../data/lines/a02/a02-106/a02-106-08.png: recognised their rights and recommended a form of

../data/lines/a06/a06-128/a06-128-09.png: that the problem " must be solved

../data/lines/a06/a06-134/a06-134-01.png: West Germany were published in Moscow yesterday . They
../data/lines/a06/a06-134/a06-134-02.png: tell : The U.S. - It is false to say the absence of a peace
../data/lines/a06/a06-134/a06-134-03.png: treaty with Germany causes no real danger . West Germany ,
../data/lines/a06/a06-134/a06-134-04.png: with its militarists and revenge-seekers , is becoming a

../data/lines/a06/a06-134/a06-134-06.png: the U.S. , Britain and France , it has more than enough
../data/lines/a06/a06-134/a06-134-07.png: forces and arms to touch off a world war .
../data/lines/a06/a06-141/a06-141-00.png: BRITAIN - One cannot but wonder at British bases being
../data/lines/a06/a06-141/a06-141-01.png: put at the disposal of those very militarists who razed
../data/lines/a06/a06-141/a06-141-02.png: Coventry and barbarously bombed London and other British
../data/lines/a06/a06-141/a06-141-03.png: cities . FRANCE - One can hardly conceive the French are
../data/lines/a06/a06-141/a06-141-04.png: not alarmed ... . Next door , in West Germany , before everyone's
../data/lines/a06/a06-141/a06-141-05.png: eyes there has sprung up a regular army led by former Nazi
../data/lines/a06/a06-147/a06-147-00.png: With fire and sword France denies Algeria the right to self-
../data/lines/a06/a06-147/a06-147-01.png: determination and tramples on Tunisians' right to independence .
../data/lines/a06/a06-147/a06-147-02.png: WEST GERMANY - Russia would like to see a clear #
../data/lines/a06/a06-147/a06-147-03.png: realization that West Germany would not survive even a few hours
../data/lines/a06/a06-147/a06-147-04.png: of a third world war . The best way to rule out such a tragic
../data/lines/a06/a06-147/a06-147-05.png: contingency would be to sign a peace treaty to remove the cancerous
../data/lines/a06/a06-147/a06-147-06.png: growth of West Berlin's occupation status .
../data/lines/a06/a06-152/a06-152-00.png: Behind Bonn's slogan of German self-
../data/lines/a06/a06-152/a06-152-01.png: determination is the intention to impose
../data/lines/a06/a06-152/a06-152-02.png: on East Germany the regime existing in
../data/lines/a06/a06-152/a06-152-03.png: West Germany . REFUGEES are pouring out
../data/lines/a06/a06-152/a06-152-05.png: Berlin faster than ever . Mr. K's latest
../data/lines/a06/a06-152/a06-152-07.png: cross into West Berlin's reception centre
../data/lines/a06/a06-152/a06-152-09.png: expect the total to leap to
../data/lines/a06/a06-157/a06-157-00.png: This figure has been surpassed only on the eve of the
../data/lines/a06/a06-157/a06-157-01.png: East German disturbances on July 17 , 1953 . And officials
../data/lines/a06/a06-157/a06-157-02.png: fear it may be too much for the city's refugee camps .
../data/lines/a06/a06-157/a06-157-03.png: They will overflow and private houses will have to be used .
../data/lines/b01/b01-000/b01-000-00.png: Prime Minister after Prime Minister speaks out
../data/lines/b01/b01-000/b01-000-01.png: in revulsion against the South African
../data/lines/b01/b01-000/b01-000-02.png: Government's policy of apartheid as we wait
../data/lines/b01/b01-000/b01-000-03.png: for the curtain to rise on the Commonwealth
../data/lines/b01/b01-000/b01-000-04.png: Conference in London . Will it end with
../data/lines/b01/b01-000/b01-000-06.png: Commonwealth ? The issue is touch and go .
../data/lines/b01/b01-004/b01-004-00.png: There is a possibility that it will not be
../data/lines/b01/b01-004/b01-004-01.png: settled at this conference . It may be agreed to
../data/lines/b01/b01-004/b01-004-02.png: wait until South Africa actually becomes a
../data/lines/b01/b01-004/b01-004-03.png: Republic later in the year . But if a final
../data/lines/b01/b01-004/b01-004-04.png: decision is to be faced now , on which side
../data/lines/b01/b01-004/b01-004-05.png: do the strongest arguments lie ? THE Archbishop
../data/lines/b01/b01-004/b01-004-06.png: of Capetown has shown that the matter is
../data/lines/b01/b01-009/b01-009-00.png: The Archbishop has long been a courageous
../data/lines/b01/b01-009/b01-009-01.png: fighter against apartheid . He must be heard
../data/lines/b01/b01-009/b01-009-02.png: with attention . On purely practical grounds he
../data/lines/b01/b01-009/b01-009-03.png: holds that it would be a mistake to expel
../data/lines/b01/b01-009/b01-009-04.png: South Africa , weakening the whites who are
../data/lines/b01/b01-009/b01-009-05.png: working for a change of policy . In his view
../data/lines/b01/b01-009/b01-009-06.png: it would also be against the interests of the
../data/lines/b01/b01-014/b01-014-00.png: He holds that more pressure can be put on South
../data/lines/b01/b01-014/b01-014-01.png: Africa while she remains in the Commonwealth
../data/lines/b01/b01-014/b01-014-02.png: than could be exercised were she cut off from it .
../data/lines/b01/b01-014/b01-014-03.png: On the other hand , those who favour expulsion , inclu-
../data/lines/b01/b01-014/b01-014-04.png: ding African leaders , feel that nothing less than the
../data/lines/b01/b01-014/b01-014-05.png: shock of expulsion will weaken the grip of Dr.
../data/lines/b01/b01-014/b01-014-06.png: Verwoerd and the Nationalists . They point out
../data/lines/b01/b01-014/b01-014-07.png: that Dr. Verwoerd refuses to consider abandoning
../data/lines/b01/b01-018/b01-018-00.png: THE Commonwealth is a multi-racial society . A
../data/lines/b01/b01-018/b01-018-01.png: policy of racial discrimination in any of its countries
../data/lines/b01/b01-018/b01-018-02.png: is surely the one thing that it could not survive .
../data/lines/b01/b01-018/b01-018-03.png: Whatever statesmen say at the conference table in
../data/lines/b01/b01-018/b01-018-04.png: London , millions at home would regard as fraudulent
../data/lines/b01/b01-018/b01-018-05.png: a Commonwealth which had room for a racist
../data/lines/b01/b01-018/b01-018-06.png: South Africa . And this is a Commonwealth in
../data/lines/b01/b01-018/b01-018-07.png: which five citizens are coloured for every one
../data/lines/b01/b01-023/b01-023-00.png: Seen in this wider picture , a South Africa that clings to
../data/lines/b01/b01-023/b01-023-01.png: apartheid is a menace to the Commonwealth and a
../data/lines/b01/b01-023/b01-023-02.png: liability to the whole Western world . A practical
../data/lines/b01/b01-023/b01-023-03.png: solution would be for the Commonwealth to draft
../data/lines/b01/b01-023/b01-023-04.png: a set of principles excluding race discrimination .
../data/lines/b01/b01-023/b01-023-05.png: And so leave South Africa to make the grade ,
../data/lines/b01/b01-027/b01-027-00.png: THE Queen and the Duke of Edinburgh come home
../data/lines/b01/b01-027/b01-027-01.png: tonight from their tour in the East . The duke's
../data/lines/b01/b01-027/b01-027-02.png: trigger-finger and the ritual slaughter of beasts
../data/lines/b01/b01-027/b01-027-03.png: have taken the headlines in this country .
../data/lines/b01/b01-027/b01-027-04.png: Nevertheless , the tour has been an immense
../data/lines/b01/b01-027/b01-027-05.png: success . The Queen has won a triumph . It
../data/lines/b01/b01-027/b01-027-06.png: would be pleasanter if such cruel and feudal
../data/lines/b01/b01-027/b01-027-07.png: performances as tiger and rhino hunts were
../data/lines/b01/b01-033/b01-033-00.png: But the Queen and the Duke have pleased millions by
../data/lines/b01/b01-033/b01-033-01.png: their visit . The warmth of their welcome in India and
../data/lines/b01/b01-033/b01-033-02.png: Pakistan are happy memories . WEST GERMANY - followed
../data/lines/b01/b01-033/b01-033-03.png: yesterday by the Dutch - has made the gesture
../data/lines/b01/b01-033/b01-033-04.png: of a good neighbour . She has put up the value
../data/lines/b01/b01-038/b01-038-00.png: Certainly , the rise is very small . But it is a step
../data/lines/b01/b01-038/b01-038-01.png: in the direction of live-and-let-live . Hopes
../data/lines/b01/b01-038/b01-038-02.png: will now grow brighter of further international
../data/lines/b01/b01-038/b01-038-03.png: co-operation , which is the only way to solve the
../data/lines/b01/b01-038/b01-038-04.png: payments difficulties that upset the Western world .
../data/lines/b01/b01-038/b01-038-05.png: Britain and the U.S. , which have problems with
../data/lines/b01/b01-038/b01-038-06.png: their balances , will gain some immediate help .
../data/lines/b01/b01-038/b01-038-07.png: What it means in practical terms is that our
../data/lines/b01/b01-038/b01-038-08.png: exports to Germany will now be a little cheaper
../data/lines/b01/b01-038/b01-038-09.png: for Germans to buy , while the goods which
../data/lines/b01/b01-038/b01-038-10.png: Germany exports will be made a little dearer .
../data/lines/b01/b01-044/b01-044-00.png: Booming Germany is deliberately encouraging more imports
../data/lines/b01/b01-044/b01-044-01.png: as a means to curb rising prices at home . She is
../data/lines/b01/b01-044/b01-044-02.png: also aware how # unpopular she has been growing
../data/lines/b01/b01-044/b01-044-03.png: by failing until now to co-operate as a creditor nation
../data/lines/b01/b01-044/b01-044-04.png: should . Germany exports much more than she imports .
../data/lines/b01/b01-044/b01-044-05.png: For upwards of five years the world's reserves of
../data/lines/b01/b01-044/b01-044-06.png: dollars have been drained into Germany .
../data/lines/b01/b01-049/b01-049-00.png: There they have stayed uselessly locked up because
../data/lines/b01/b01-049/b01-049-01.png: Germany has no tradition of trading abroad . In addition
../data/lines/b01/b01-049/b01-049-02.png: the strength of Germany's trading position has attracted
../data/lines/b01/b01-049/b01-049-03.png: speculators to hold marks rather than pounds or dollars ,
../data/lines/b01/b01-049/b01-049-04.png: hoping for the mark to rise , as has now happened .
../data/lines/b01/b01-049/b01-049-05.png: WILL the new valuation be enough to correct
../data/lines/b01/b01-049/b01-049-06.png: Germany's massive trading surplus and choke
../data/lines/b01/b01-049/b01-049-07.png: off speculation against dollar and pound ?
../data/lines/b01/b01-053/b01-053-00.png: That is doubtful . If however , in addition to her new
../data/lines/b01/b01-053/b01-053-01.png: good-neighbour gesture , Germany takes a really big
../data/lines/b01/b01-053/b01-053-02.png: share in giving aid to underdeveloped nations , the
../data/lines/b01/b01-053/b01-053-03.png: world outlook will be brighter . What gives rise
../data/lines/b01/b01-053/b01-053-04.png: to optimism is the sign that Germany and the
../data/lines/b01/b01-053/b01-053-05.png: other leading Western nations are at long last
../data/lines/b01/b01-053/b01-053-06.png: moving towards a solution of currency problems
../data/lines/b01/b01-057/b01-057-00.png: A CURIOUS advertisement on page nine , paid
../data/lines/b01/b01-057/b01-057-01.png: for by that curious body Moral Re-Armament .
../data/lines/b01/b01-057/b01-057-02.png: Those who lend their names to this kind of
../data/lines/b01/b01-057/b01-057-03.png: advertisement are worthy people , a little innocent
../data/lines/b01/b01-057/b01-057-04.png: of politics , perhaps , or carried away by the
../data/lines/b01/b01-057/b01-057-05.png: idea that moral regeneration would solve
../data/lines/b01/b01-057/b01-057-06.png: all our problems . So it would . While we are
../data/lines/b01/b01-057/b01-057-07.png: waiting for the millenium , however , most of us
../data/lines/b01/b01-057/b01-057-08.png: would prefer to put our hopes for earthly justice in
../data/lines/b01/b01-057/b01-057-09.png: instruments of democracy , such as trade unions
../data/lines/b01/b01-057/b01-057-10.png: and our local and national Parliaments .
../data/lines/b01/b01-062/b01-062-00.png: Should the Herald publish such advertisements ?
../data/lines/b01/b01-062/b01-062-01.png: This is a difficult question . It would obviously
../data/lines/b01/b01-062/b01-062-02.png: be wrong to refuse all political advertisements with

../data/lines/b01/b01-062/b01-062-06.png: deeply repugnant to our readers , it is right to
../data/lines/b01/b01-062/b01-062-08.png: advertisement falls into neither category , though
../data/lines/b01/b01-073/b01-073-00.png: The first reaction of the Sudanese
../data/lines/b01/b01-073/b01-073-01.png: Government was to denounce the United
../data/lines/b01/b01-073/b01-073-02.png: Nations for " negligence and impotence , " and
../data/lines/b01/b01-073/b01-073-03.png: to say that its 400 troops in the Congo
../data/lines/b01/b01-073/b01-073-04.png: would be taken home . The reaction can be
../data/lines/b01/b01-073/b01-073-05.png: understood . The Sudan's concern for its
../data/lines/b01/b01-073/b01-073-06.png: men is natural . But this could hardly be
../data/lines/b01/b01-073/b01-073-07.png: a # dignified exit . IF the UN is
../data/lines/b01/b01-073/b01-073-08.png: blamed for being weak , it would be
../data/lines/b01/b01-073/b01-073-09.png: more logical to send in more men ,
../data/lines/b01/b01-073/b01-073-10.png: not weaken it further by desertion .
../data/lines/b01/b01-079/b01-079-00.png: It is unjust to pass the buck to Mr.
../data/lines/b01/b01-079/b01-079-01.png: Hammarskjold and the UN's servants . The
../data/lines/b01/b01-079/b01-079-02.png: responsibility rightly belongs to the nations
../data/lines/b01/b01-079/b01-079-03.png: which have undertaken the task of pre-
../data/lines/b01/b01-079/b01-079-04.png: serving peace in the Congo . That is not a
../data/lines/b01/b01-079/b01-079-05.png: ceremonial duty , and the soldiers have every
../data/lines/b01/b01-079/b01-079-06.png: right to blame the politicians unless they see
../data/lines/b01/b01-079/b01-079-07.png: it through . When the United Nations instructed
../data/lines/b01/b01-079/b01-079-08.png: Mr. Hammarskjold to use force if necessary to
../data/lines/b01/b01-079/b01-079-09.png: prevent civil war , it was clear that new dangers
../data/lines/b01/b01-079/b01-079-10.png: would arise unless it gave him the political ...
../data/lines/b01/b01-084/b01-084-00.png: That was the first point that Mr. Hammarskjold
../data/lines/b01/b01-084/b01-084-01.png: made . India has responded handsomely by providing
../data/lines/b01/b01-084/b01-084-02.png: 3,000 men , who must take about a fortnight to arrive .
../data/lines/b01/b01-084/b01-084-03.png: If the UN forces were thick enough on the ground ,
../data/lines/b01/b01-084/b01-084-04.png: such incidents as that at Matadi would not
../data/lines/b01/b01-084/b01-084-05.png: happen . THE UN's ability to keep peace depends
../data/lines/b01/b01-084/b01-084-06.png: simply on adequate support by the nations
../data/lines/b01/b01-084/b01-084-07.png: which have set their hands to this plough .
../data/lines/b01/b01-089/b01-089-00.png: The big Powers involved in the Cold War
../data/lines/b01/b01-089/b01-089-01.png: must of course keep out . The Americans were
../data/lines/b01/b01-089/b01-089-02.png: justified in diverting naval ships in case
../data/lines/b01/b01-089/b01-089-03.png: non-combatant help was wanted ; but they
../data/lines/b01/b01-089/b01-089-04.png: stressed that there was no intention to intervene
../data/lines/b01/b01-089/b01-089-05.png: in fighting . Yesterday the ships turned away
../data/lines/b01/b01-089/b01-089-06.png: again , satisfied that they were not required .
../data/lines/b01/b01-089/b01-089-07.png: It is to be hoped that the UN will be
../data/lines/b01/b01-089/b01-089-08.png: re-established in their port by negotiation
../data/lines/b01/b01-089/b01-089-09.png: and that there will be no more outrages .
../data/lines/b01/b01-094/b01-094-00.png: But back , Mr. Hammarskjold is determined ,
../data/lines/b01/b01-094/b01-094-01.png: they must go . The best news for the Congo
../data/lines/b01/b01-094/b01-094-02.png: would be agreement between its rival
../data/lines/b01/b01-094/b01-094-03.png: political leaders . Through the patient efforts
../data/lines/b01/b01-094/b01-094-04.png: of UN conciliators they are meeting for
../data/lines/b01/b01-094/b01-094-05.png: the first time , in Malagasy ( formerly
../data/lines/b01/b01-094/b01-094-06.png: Madagascar ) . THE world will sigh with
../data/lines/b01/b01-094/b01-094-07.png: relief when this strife-torn land gets
../data/lines/b01/b01-094/b01-094-08.png: itself a government which all outsiders
../data/lines/b01/b01-113/b01-113-00.png: ONLY a man wrapped in the impenetrable cocoon of what he regards
../data/lines/b01/b01-113/b01-113-01.png: as a divine mission could have spoken of apartheid as " a
../data/lines/b01/b01-113/b01-113-02.png: policy of good neighbourliness . " We may be sure that
../data/lines/b01/b01-113/b01-113-03.png: he is not being hypocritical . That is what he
../data/lines/b01/b01-113/b01-113-04.png: really believes . A good neighbour to those Africans
../data/lines/b01/b01-113/b01-113-05.png: who , under apartheid , will be forced back to
../data/lines/b01/b01-113/b01-113-06.png: their tribal reserves with no prospect but a
../data/lines/b01/b01-118/b01-118-00.png: A good neighbour to those Africans who will con-
../data/lines/b01/b01-118/b01-118-01.png: tinue to live as hewers of wood and drawers of
../data/lines/b01/b01-118/b01-118-02.png: water in the white areas of South Africa , without rights
../data/lines/b01/b01-118/b01-118-03.png: and without hope . THE same sort of good neighbour
../data/lines/b01/b01-118/b01-118-04.png: that he proved to be to the Jews fleeing from
../data/lines/b01/b01-118/b01-118-05.png: Hitler in the thirties . It was Dr. Verwoerd who

../data/lines/b01/b01-122/b01-122-01.png: woerd in his nightmare world . It is this that
../data/lines/b01/b01-122/b01-122-02.png: makes illusory any hopes that he may be in-
../data/lines/b01/b01-122/b01-122-03.png: fluenced to change course . The Archbishop of

../data/lines/b01/b01-122/b01-122-08.png: left even more isolated and alone .
../data/lines/b01/b01-127/b01-127-00.png: The views of the Archbishop , who has
../data/lines/b01/b01-127/b01-127-01.png: maintained an unflinching witness to what

../data/lines/b01/b01-127/b01-127-03.png: what , in fact , can the other Commonwealth countries
../data/lines/b01/b01-127/b01-127-04.png: do to bring support and comfort to this gallant
../data/lines/b01/b01-127/b01-127-05.png: minority ? THERE is no evidence that the
../data/lines/b01/b01-127/b01-127-06.png: policy of appeasement has modified the
../data/lines/b01/b01-127/b01-127-07.png: actions of the Nationalists . On the contrary ,

../data/lines/b01/b01-132/b01-132-04.png: to disaster . It may be that the Commonwealth

../data/lines/b04/b04-103/b04-103-04.png: even their shoes cleaned ? How wonderful if they
../data/lines/b04/b04-103/b04-103-05.png: showed their appreciation this morning with a surprise
../data/lines/b04/b04-103/b04-103-06.png: box of chocolates or a bunch of flowers !
../data/lines/b04/b04-107/b04-107-00.png: HOW the Government must repent its haste and folly
../data/lines/b04/b04-107/b04-107-01.png: in Rhodesia ! Eighteen months ago this territory
../data/lines/b04/b04-107/b04-107-02.png: was peaceful , orderly , and thriving . Africans within the
../data/lines/b04/b04-107/b04-107-03.png: Federal Government were getting valuable experience in
../data/lines/b04/b04-107/b04-107-04.png: administration . Then Mr. Iain Macleod became Colonial
../data/lines/b04/b04-107/b04-107-05.png: Secretary . Suddenly everything changed . Timetables were
../data/lines/b04/b04-107/b04-107-06.png: scrapped . The ill-conceived Monckton Commission was
../data/lines/b04/b04-107/b04-107-07.png: rushed out to Rhodesia . Overnight , minor African
../data/lines/b04/b04-107/b04-107-08.png: politicians were inflated into international figures .
../data/lines/b04/b04-116/b04-116-00.png: And as the British Government stepped up the pace
../data/lines/b04/b04-116/b04-116-01.png: of change , so the Africans stepped up their demands .
../data/lines/b04/b04-116/b04-116-02.png: TODAY , in London , that rash and thoughtless policy has
../data/lines/b04/b04-116/b04-116-03.png: caused a crisis - a crisis that never should have happened .
../data/lines/b04/b04-116/b04-116-04.png: No wonder there is doubt and fearful heart-searching .
../data/lines/b04/b04-116/b04-116-05.png: If the Government now reverses its plan to give the
../data/lines/b04/b04-116/b04-116-06.png: Africans control in Northern Rhodesia it may indeed face
../data/lines/b04/b04-116/b04-116-07.png: difficulties from African politicians greedy for power .
../data/lines/b04/b04-121/b04-121-00.png: But if it fails to modify that plan Rhodesia may well
../data/lines/b04/b04-121/b04-121-01.png: be plunged into chaos , like the Congo . For Mr.
../data/lines/b04/b04-121/b04-121-02.png: Macmillan and his ministers there is no choice . They
../data/lines/b04/b04-121/b04-121-03.png: must safeguard Rhodesia against chaos . And try to
../data/lines/b04/b04-121/b04-121-04.png: repair the damage they have done . WHO can grow the
../data/lines/b04/b04-121/b04-121-05.png: fastest ? That is the exciting competition going on
../data/lines/b04/b04-128/b04-128-00.png: Top of the table , at the moment , is the chemical industry .
../data/lines/b04/b04-128/b04-128-01.png: Then comes engineering , followed by iron and steel .
../data/lines/b04/b04-128/b04-128-02.png: Even the staid and timid Treasury is cheered by the
../data/lines/b04/b04-128/b04-128-03.png: tremendous upsurge in investment . It reports that new
../data/lines/b04/b04-128/b04-128-04.png: factory building this year is likely to be 40 per cent
../data/lines/b04/b04-128/b04-128-05.png: up on 1960 . Britain's business men are right to back
../data/lines/b04/b04-134/b04-134-00.png: For expansion today means still greater
../data/lines/b04/b04-134/b04-134-02.png: the 88-year-old standard bearer of the Ban-

../data/lines/b04/b04-140/b04-140-03.png: Russia . Now he wants Britain to demolish her

../data/lines/c02/c02-012/c02-012-00.png: Every unnecessary detail , all superfluous local
../data/lines/c02/c02-012/c02-012-01.png: colouring must be eliminated . He does not
../data/lines/c02/c02-012/c02-012-02.png: want the accuracy of a police photograph ,
../data/lines/c02/c02-012/c02-012-03.png: but rather he wants to show the eternal in
../data/lines/c02/c02-012/c02-012-04.png: every instant . " The chilling horror of " Mala-
../data/lines/c02/c02-012/c02-012-05.png: chias " is due as much to Wicki the photo-
../data/lines/c02/c02-012/c02-012-06.png: grapher as to Wicki the director . His earlier
../data/lines/c02/c02-012/c02-012-07.png: film , " Die Bru"cke , " was equally terrifying ,
../data/lines/c02/c02-012/c02-012-08.png: but here the director moves out of the world
../data/lines/c02/c02-012/c02-012-09.png: of reality into an icy supernatural vacuum
../data/lines/c02/c02-017/c02-017-00.png: Following Bruce Marshall's original novel with
../data/lines/c02/c02-017/c02-017-01.png: considerable fidelity , the film tells the story
../data/lines/c02/c02-017/c02-017-02.png: of a little monk who prays that a disrepu-
../data/lines/c02/c02-017/c02-017-03.png: table night club near his church be re-
../data/lines/c02/c02-017/c02-017-04.png: moved . One night his prayer is answered
../data/lines/c02/c02-017/c02-017-05.png: and the offending establishment is suddenly
../data/lines/c02/c02-017/c02-017-06.png: transplanted to an island in the North Sea .
../data/lines/c02/c02-017/c02-017-07.png: But Father Malachias's troubles have only
../data/lines/c02/c02-017/c02-017-08.png: begun . Instead of having the desired effect ,
../data/lines/c02/c02-017/c02-017-09.png: the miracle becomes exploited by a group
../data/lines/c02/c02-022/c02-022-00.png: Soon a carnival springs up on the sight of
../data/lines/c02/c02-022/c02-022-01.png: the missing building . The Church rebukes the
../data/lines/c02/c02-022/c02-022-02.png: poor monk for his miracle , and as a
../data/lines/c02/c02-022/c02-022-03.png: crowning indignity the night club is
../data/lines/c02/c02-022/c02-022-04.png: given a gala society reopening on the
../data/lines/c02/c02-022/c02-022-05.png: island . Father Malachias goes to the island ,
../data/lines/c02/c02-022/c02-022-06.png: prays , and in a second miracle the
../data/lines/c02/c02-022/c02-022-07.png: night club is replaced in its original
../data/lines/c02/c02-026/c02-026-00.png: A summary of the story can give almost
../data/lines/c02/c02-026/c02-026-01.png: indication of the scope of Wicki's artistry . He
../data/lines/c02/c02-026/c02-026-02.png: tells his story best in the faces of his crowds ,
../data/lines/c02/c02-026/c02-026-03.png: recording every wrinkle and drop of sweat
../data/lines/c02/c02-026/c02-026-04.png: with brutal honesty , building up to a
../data/lines/c02/c02-026/c02-026-05.png: tremendous climax in the island orgy .
../data/lines/c02/c02-026/c02-026-06.png: Here , the guests arrive in ghost-like yachts ,
../data/lines/c02/c02-026/c02-026-07.png: the wildly flapping white sails slashed by
../data/lines/c02/c02-026/c02-026-08.png: the glaring beacon of a lighthouse .
../data/lines/c02/c02-030/c02-030-00.png: When the final miracle does occur , it is accepted as a
../data/lines/c02/c02-030/c02-030-01.png: marvellous joke ; no one has learned anything . Wicki
../data/lines/c02/c02-030/c02-030-02.png: suddenly returns to the city for a final epilogue . In
../data/lines/c02/c02-030/c02-030-03.png: complete silence he shows the faces of people
../data/lines/c02/c02-030/c02-030-04.png: walking in the streets , smug , content , satisfied ,
../data/lines/c02/c02-030/c02-030-06.png: succeeded in his second film in
../data/lines/c02/c02-030/c02-030-07.png: recording his personal apocalypse of the
../data/lines/c02/c02-030/c02-030-08.png: last days of a sick society .
../data/lines/c02/c02-035/c02-035-00.png: It is most unfair to call " Malachias " a cut-rate
../data/lines/c02/c02-035/c02-035-01.png: " Dolce Vita , " for it is far more intimate and deeply
../data/lines/c02/c02-035/c02-035-02.png: felt . In 1944 Herbert Selpin tried a similar feat
../data/lines/c02/c02-035/c02-035-03.png: in " Titanic " by paralleling the last days of the
../data/lines/c02/c02-035/c02-035-04.png: Third Reich with the sinking of the great ocean liner ,
../data/lines/c02/c02-035/c02-035-05.png: and paid for his audacity with his life .
../data/lines/c02/c02-049/c02-049-00.png: Strangely enough , the Berlin audience received
../data/lines/c02/c02-049/c02-049-01.png: the film with extreme coolness , much preferring
../data/lines/c02/c02-049/c02-049-03.png: est une Femme , " a ninety-one minute hymn
../data/lines/c02/c02-049/c02-049-04.png: to " Vogue , " " Cahiers du Cinema , " and the
../data/lines/c02/c02-049/c02-049-05.png: worst aspects of the American cinema . From
../data/lines/c02/c02-049/c02-049-06.png: a brilliantly funny start , the work fizzles
../data/lines/c02/c02-049/c02-049-07.png: out into a series of repetitious sight-gags
../data/lines/c02/c02-049/c02-049-08.png: and personal jokes incomprehensible to the
../data/lines/c02/c02-049/c02-049-09.png: uninitiated ( including four plugs for Charles
../data/lines/c02/c02-056/c02-056-00.png: This director is at last being re-evaluated and
../data/lines/c02/c02-056/c02-056-01.png: given his proper place in the history of the
../data/lines/c02/c02-056/c02-056-02.png: German film . Most charming was his tongue-in-cheek
../data/lines/c02/c02-056/c02-056-04.png: with a light touch , and there was much to admire
../data/lines/c02/c02-056/c02-056-05.png: in " Dreyfus " ( 1930 ) and the virtually unknown
../data/lines/c02/c02-056/c02-056-07.png: tries to show that it took more than just
../data/lines/c02/c02-056/c02-056-08.png: Germany to start the First World War .
../data/lines/c02/c02-059/c02-059-01.png: Prizes being what they are , Berlin is unusually
../data/lines/c02/c02-059/c02-059-02.png: generous in giving everyone something , and silver
../data/lines/c02/c02-059/c02-059-03.png: bears are awarded in every direction . Both the
../data/lines/c02/c02-059/c02-059-04.png: Antonioni and Wicki films took high honours ,
../data/lines/c02/c02-059/c02-059-05.png: and the audience at the awards was particularly
../data/lines/c02/c02-059/c02-059-06.png: enthusiastic when one Miss Anna Kerima was selected
../data/lines/c02/c02-059/c02-059-07.png: as best actress for her work in the Godard
../data/lines/c02/c02-059/c02-059-08.png: film . Gifted with an interesting face , although little
../data/lines/c02/c02-059/c02-059-09.png: acting ability , she would seem to be well
../data/lines/c02/c02-059/c02-059-10.png: worth watching in the months to come .
../data/lines/c02/c02-078/c02-078-00.png: It has a great look of speed and technical fun
../data/lines/c02/c02-078/c02-078-01.png: about it , of enormous cinematic enjoyment , and
../data/lines/c02/c02-078/c02-078-02.png: above all of cinematic sense . Much of it has
../data/lines/c02/c02-078/c02-078-03.png: that air of improvisation , as of off-the-cuff
../data/lines/c02/c02-078/c02-078-04.png: living , that once seemed so new and so
../data/lines/c02/c02-078/c02-078-05.png: attractive . The story ( not that the story , in the
../data/lines/c02/c02-078/c02-078-06.png: sense of plot , matters much ; but in the sense of
../data/lines/c02/c02-078/c02-078-07.png: situation and movement it matters a lot ) is
../data/lines/c02/c02-078/c02-078-08.png: that of a man on the run ( Jean-Paul Belmondo ) ,
../data/lines/c02/c02-078/c02-078-09.png: who spends a few days with an American girl
../data/lines/c02/c02-082/c02-082-00.png: Belmondo reappears at the Paris Pullman
../data/lines/c02/c02-082/c02-082-02.png: lated into Seven Days ... Seven Nights ...

../data/lines/c04/c04-000/c04-000-00.png: NEXT month that friendly , effervescent performer Frankie
../data/lines/c04/c04-000/c04-000-01.png: Vaughan will burst on to the London Palladium stage
../data/lines/c04/c04-000/c04-000-02.png: in a new show . To paraphrase his well-known ditty :
../data/lines/c04/c04-000/c04-000-03.png: " He 'll have the limelight , they 'll give him the girls -
../data/lines/c04/c04-000/c04-000-04.png: and leave the rest to him . "
../data/lines/c04/c04-004/c04-004-00.png: I have a hunch that he will feel more at home in the
../data/lines/c04/c04-004/c04-004-01.png: old , star-studded West End than he will ever feel in
../data/lines/c04/c04-004/c04-004-02.png: Hollywood . His American bosses , 20th-Century Fox , have
../data/lines/c04/c04-004/c04-004-03.png: recently given Frankie the full , razzamataz , red-carpet
../data/lines/c04/c04-004/c04-004-04.png: treatment . But they haven't done a thing for his film
../data/lines/c04/c04-004/c04-004-05.png: career that Anna Neagle and Herbert Wilcox were not
../data/lines/c04/c04-004/c04-004-06.png: doing better here , before the platinum-plated Hollywood
../data/lines/c04/c04-004/c04-004-07.png: carrot was dangled before his nose .
../data/lines/c04/c04-008/c04-008-00.png: In his first Hollywood picture , " Let 's Make Love , " he
../data/lines/c04/c04-008/c04-008-01.png: was swamped by the know-how of Marilyn Monroe
../data/lines/c04/c04-008/c04-008-02.png: and Yves Montand . Against this couple Frankie , in
../data/lines/c04/c04-008/c04-008-03.png: a cardboard role , didn't stand a chance . Now comes
../data/lines/c04/c04-008/c04-008-04.png: " The Right Approach " ( Rialto , " A " ) , and it 's a glum
../data/lines/c04/c04-008/c04-008-05.png: business . He plays an aspiring actor - a
../data/lines/c04/c04-008/c04-008-06.png: selfish , arrogant , brash , ambitious , unscrupulous heel -
../data/lines/c04/c04-008/c04-008-07.png: who would tread on anybody's neck to get a break in
../data/lines/c04/c04-013/c04-013-00.png: He double-crosses the five pals with whom he lives ,
../data/lines/c04/c04-013/c04-013-01.png: cheats a waitress ( Juliet Prowse ) and cynically uses
../data/lines/c04/c04-013/c04-013-02.png: a magazine editress ( Martha Hyer ) to get ahead .
../data/lines/c04/c04-013/c04-013-03.png: Frankie Vaughan is too nice a chap to ring quite
../data/lines/c04/c04-013/c04-013-04.png: true as a smooth-tongued , ill-mannered Yank . His
../data/lines/c04/c04-013/c04-013-05.png: best moments are when he swings breezily into the
../data/lines/c04/c04-017/c04-017-00.png: But 6,000 miles seems a heck of a way to go
../data/lines/c04/c04-017/c04-017-01.png: for a new hit song . He might be well advised to
../data/lines/c04/c04-017/c04-017-02.png: think hard and long before his next jump into the
../data/lines/c04/c04-017/c04-017-04.png: VERDICT : Vaughan should have by-passed this approach .
../data/lines/c04/c04-017/c04-017-05.png: RONALD Lewis has just left for his first taste of the
../data/lines/c04/c04-017/c04-017-06.png: Hollywood treatment , thanks to a sound performance in
../data/lines/c04/c04-017/c04-017-07.png: " Taste of Fear " ( Warner Theatre , " X " ) .
../data/lines/c04/c04-023/c04-023-00.png: He has earned his break . The film is a well-made
../data/lines/c04/c04-023/c04-023-01.png: variation on that sinister yarn in which half the cast
../data/lines/c04/c04-023/c04-023-02.png: try to persuade the heroine that she is out of her mind .
../data/lines/c04/c04-023/c04-023-03.png: Despite flagrant cheating the eerie atmosphere is
../data/lines/c04/c04-023/c04-023-04.png: built up neatly . Susan Strasberg is the crippled
../data/lines/c04/c04-028/c04-028-00.png: Stepmother Ann Todd and doctor Christopher Lee are
../data/lines/c04/c04-028/c04-028-01.png: also effectively around . They provide some chilly red
../data/lines/c04/c04-028/c04-028-02.png: herrings in this " Find-the-body " thriller . VERDICT :
../data/lines/c04/c04-028/c04-028-03.png: Don't believe all you see and hear !
../data/lines/c04/c04-028/c04-028-04.png: NOT for the first time the homely mug of Sidney
../data/lines/c04/c04-028/c04-028-05.png: James has pumped life into a slim , strained
../data/lines/c04/c04-028/c04-028-06.png: comedy . He does his rescue act in " Double Bunk "
../data/lines/c04/c04-035/c04-035-00.png: Navigator Sid is a tower of strength when
../data/lines/c04/c04-035/c04-035-01.png: newly-weds Ian Carmichael and Janette Scott let
../data/lines/c04/c04-035/c04-035-02.png: loose their ancient houseboat on a honeymoon trip down
../data/lines/c04/c04-035/c04-035-03.png: the river . The film starts off brightly enough but ,
../data/lines/c04/c04-035/c04-035-04.png: half-way through , the plot ( as well as the boat ) springs
../data/lines/c04/c04-035/c04-035-05.png: a near-disastrous leak . Familiar members of Britain's
../data/lines/c04/c04-035/c04-035-06.png: repertory team of comedy character-actors jump through
../data/lines/c04/c04-035/c04-035-07.png: equally familiar hoops to mild laughter .
../data/lines/c04/c04-039/c04-039-01.png: DONALD HOUSTON had a big success on A
../data/lines/c04/c04-039/c04-039-02.png: " Drama '61 " last night as a smooth ,
../data/lines/c04/c04-039/c04-039-03.png: scheming jewel thief in a play by Jacques
../data/lines/c04/c04-039/c04-039-04.png: Gillies , " The Takers . " A polished production
../data/lines/c04/c04-039/c04-039-05.png: by Quentin Lawrence , here , held together
../data/lines/c04/c04-039/c04-039-07.png: performance as the master mind behind a
../data/lines/c04/c04-044/c04-044-00.png: This plot to rob a French millionaire of 300,000
../data/lines/c04/c04-044/c04-044-01.png: worth of jewellery struck me as ingenious . The play
../data/lines/c04/c04-044/c04-044-02.png: had style , moved at a quick pace and everyone did
../data/lines/c04/c04-044/c04-044-03.png: well . But it was Mr. Houston's evening .
../data/lines/c04/c04-044/c04-044-04.png: Earlier , on the Palladium show I found Stanley
../data/lines/c04/c04-044/c04-044-05.png: Holloway's act too long and not particularly
../data/lines/c04/c04-044/c04-044-06.png: entertaining . It was also a mistake to
../data/lines/c04/c04-044/c04-044-07.png: re-book Gene Detroy and his performing chimpanzees
../data/lines/c04/c04-044/c04-044-08.png: so soon after their previous appearance .
../data/lines/c04/c04-050/c04-050-00.png: Their offering last night differed little
../data/lines/c04/c04-050/c04-050-01.png: from their earlier act on this show a week
../data/lines/c04/c04-050/c04-050-02.png: or so ago . But the Mudlarks , with Jeff Mudd
../data/lines/c04/c04-050/c04-050-03.png: out of the Army and back with sister Mary
../data/lines/c04/c04-050/c04-050-04.png: and brother Fred , were in bright , zestful
../data/lines/c04/c04-050/c04-050-05.png: form . Why only two numbers , though ? It
../data/lines/c04/c04-050/c04-050-06.png: was not enough . " A FAIR COP , " the B
../data/lines/c04/c04-050/c04-050-07.png: Whitehall farce last night , looked like
../data/lines/c04/c04-050/c04-050-08.png: a rabbit warren in a field of corn .
../data/lines/c04/c04-056/c04-056-00.png: I can't recall a production where so many
../data/lines/c04/c04-056/c04-056-01.png: comics bolted in and out of holes so often .
../data/lines/c04/c04-056/c04-056-02.png: The jokes were a reshuffle of the same old
../data/lines/c04/c04-056/c04-056-03.png: lot - this time Brian Rix lost his skirt instead
../data/lines/c04/c04-056/c04-056-04.png: of his trousers . The action moved at tremendous
../data/lines/c04/c04-056/c04-056-05.png: speed , backed by some wonderful timing by
../data/lines/c04/c04-056/c04-056-06.png: the cast . I especially liked the tea-cup
../data/lines/c04/c04-056/c04-056-07.png: scene where six of the cast changed
../data/lines/c04/c04-056/c04-056-08.png: cups with the dexterity of Chinese jugglers .
../data/lines/c04/c04-061/c04-061-00.png: Carole Shelley as the newly-wed and Larry Noble
../data/lines/c04/c04-061/c04-061-01.png: as Smiler Perkins were the most laughable . They
../data/lines/c04/c04-061/c04-061-02.png: alone used a sharp edge to their humour and cut
../data/lines/c04/c04-061/c04-061-03.png: through the gormless standing corn around them . Perhaps
../data/lines/c04/c04-061/c04-061-04.png: it was accidental - I hope not . If ever a bag of
../data/lines/c04/c04-061/c04-061-05.png: humour needed a thorough shaking up the Whitehall
../data/lines/c04/c04-061/c04-061-06.png: farce is it when it comes to television .
../data/lines/c04/c04-066/c04-066-00.png: HOW do you get on records ? Well , you 've got
../data/lines/c04/c04-066/c04-066-01.png: to have something different . Sing slightly flat .
../data/lines/c04/c04-066/c04-066-02.png: All the good singers sing in tune . Twang a guitar
../data/lines/c04/c04-066/c04-066-03.png: slightly off key . Everybody 's fed up with the
../data/lines/c04/c04-066/c04-066-04.png: right way - so the best-seller charts say . Play
../data/lines/c04/c04-066/c04-066-05.png: an OLD 2pianna instead of a new one . You got to
../data/lines/c04/c04-066/c04-066-06.png: get it into your head , son ... people
../data/lines/c04/c04-066/c04-066-07.png: don't like things as they should be - not on
../data/lines/c04/c04-075/c04-075-00.png: Thus , musician David Lisbon's chances of being a starred
../data/lines/c04/c04-075/c04-075-01.png: disc solo pianist were greatly enhanced when he dug out
../data/lines/c04/c04-075/c04-075-02.png: A PACKET OF DRAWING-PINS . " Why not , " thought ex-soldier
../data/lines/c04/c04-075/c04-075-03.png: Mr. Lisbon , who is twenty-three , and lives in Dagenham , Essex ,
../data/lines/c04/c04-075/c04-075-04.png: " press a thumb-tack into the nose of the hammers that strike
../data/lines/c04/c04-075/c04-075-05.png: the piano strings ? " He did , on his piano at home . There weren't

../data/lines/d01/d01-019/d01-019-00.png: There is a whole group of theories which attempt to explain the problems of the
../data/lines/d01/d01-019/d01-019-01.png: Fourth Gospel by explanations based on assumed textual dislocations . The
../data/lines/d01/d01-019/d01-019-02.png: present state of the Gospel is the result of an accident-prone history . The
../data/lines/d01/d01-019/d01-019-03.png: original was written on a roll , or codex , which fell into disorder or was
../data/lines/d01/d01-019/d01-019-04.png: accidentally damaged . An editor , who was not the author , made what he
../data/lines/d01/d01-019/d01-019-05.png: could of the chaos by placing the fragments , or sheets , or pages , in order .
../data/lines/d01/d01-024/d01-024-00.png: Most of those who expound a theory of textual

../data/lines/d01/d01-024/d01-024-03.png: disturbance took place but a few leave it open
../data/lines/d01/d01-024/d01-024-04.png: to suppose that the original book had been

../data/lines/d01/d01-052/d01-052-00.png: THE Fourth Gospel was almost certainly
../data/lines/d01/d01-052/d01-052-01.png: written in Greek . A modern text of the
../data/lines/d01/d01-052/d01-052-02.png: Gospel represents the work of generations of

../data/lines/d01/d01-052/d01-052-04.png: scripts of John and worked out the version
../data/lines/d01/d01-052/d01-052-05.png: which is most likely to have been the original
../data/lines/d01/d01-052/d01-052-06.png: wording . It is not possible to establish any one

../data/lines/d01/d01-056/d01-056-03.png: printed as just over 1,000 different nouns ,
../data/lines/d01/d01-056/d01-056-04.png: verbs , and other parts of speech occurring
../data/lines/d01/d01-056/d01-056-06.png: forms . There are other texts which could

../data/lines/d01/d01-056/d01-056-08.png: it is not a matter of the greatest importance
../data/lines/d01/d01-060/d01-060-00.png: At first sight the difference between
../data/lines/d01/d01-060/d01-060-01.png: Souter and the other texts is rather
../data/lines/d01/d01-060/d01-060-02.png: large . But the British text includes
../data/lines/d01/d01-060/d01-060-04.png: taken in Adultery , and this accounts
../data/lines/d01/d01-060/d01-060-05.png: for 178 words out of 279 , which is

../data/lines/d01/d01-080/d01-080-00.png: The bar was the commonest marking , but others
../data/lines/d01/d01-080/d01-080-01.png: were also used . Dots sometimes served in place of the
../data/lines/d01/d01-080/d01-080-02.png: bar , and there are cases where spacing is used as
../data/lines/d01/d01-080/d01-080-03.png: it is now used to mark a paragraph ending . Frequently
../data/lines/d01/d01-080/d01-080-04.png: paragraphos markings were omitted . C. H. Roberts is of
../data/lines/d01/d01-080/d01-080-05.png: the opinion that in the original of the Fourth Gospel
../data/lines/d01/d01-080/d01-080-06.png: some markings would be used , although which , it is

../data/lines/d01/d01-085/d01-085-02.png: original of the Gospel , whether written on a roll or codex ,
../data/lines/d01/d01-085/d01-085-03.png: whether paragraphed or not , would be laid out in
../data/lines/d01/d01-085/d01-085-04.png: columns . This is the invariable practice of ancient
../data/lines/d01/d01-085/d01-085-05.png: manuscripts . A common size of column would hold
../data/lines/d01/d01-085/d01-085-06.png: about one third of a page of Souter's print .
../data/lines/d01/d01-098/d01-098-00.png: The edge of this sheet was attached to a wooden dowel
../data/lines/d01/d01-098/d01-098-01.png: and the sheet wound round this central pin . The roll made
../data/lines/d01/d01-098/d01-098-02.png: a simple and serviceable book . It was robust - the number
../data/lines/d01/d01-098/d01-098-03.png: which have survived the centuries is ample evidence of
../data/lines/d01/d01-098/d01-098-04.png: this - and it was easily stored . It had two disadvantages . It
../data/lines/d01/d01-098/d01-098-05.png: was generally a single-sided form of book , and it was not
../data/lines/d01/d01-098/d01-098-06.png: an easy form of book in which to find a
../data/lines/d01/d01-104/d01-104-00.png: This last objection might have had some weight in
../data/lines/d01/d01-104/d01-104-01.png: ecclesiastical circles . In his Natural History , 13 . 11-12 ,
../data/lines/d01/d01-104/d01-104-02.png: the elder Pliny tells of the use of papyrus in roll-making .
../data/lines/d01/d01-104/d01-104-03.png: As Pliny was killed in the eruption of Vesuvius which
../data/lines/d01/d01-104/d01-104-04.png: overwhelmed Herculaneum and Pompeii in A.D. 79 , his
../data/lines/d01/d01-104/d01-104-05.png: information is contemporaneous with the New Testament .
../data/lines/d01/d01-104/d01-104-06.png: The other form of book was the codex . In this the
../data/lines/d01/d01-104/d01-104-07.png: sheets were bound together down one edge much as
../data/lines/d01/d01-118/d01-118-00.png: Against these advantages the codex was fragile and
../data/lines/d01/d01-118/d01-118-01.png: might be bulky . It is sometimes possible to tell
../data/lines/d01/d01-118/d01-118-02.png: whether or not a particular text was written on
../data/lines/d01/d01-118/d01-118-03.png: a roll or a codex . Rolls were prepared for
../data/lines/d01/d01-118/d01-118-04.png: writing , but any papyrus left unused at the
../data/lines/d01/d01-118/d01-118-05.png: end could be cut off . If the text was longer than
../data/lines/d01/d01-118/d01-118-06.png: the roll , a sheet could easily be glued on .
../data/lines/d01/d01-123/d01-123-00.png: The verso of the roll was blank , and one
../data/lines/d01/d01-123/d01-123-01.png: cannot think of an author , Mark for example ,
../data/lines/d01/d01-123/d01-123-02.png: sending out his Gospel lacking the ending ,
../data/lines/d01/d01-123/d01-123-03.png: while one whole side of his roll was unused .
../data/lines/d01/d01-123/d01-123-04.png: The codex form was not so accommodating . Even
../data/lines/d01/d01-123/d01-123-05.png: in the case of the single-sheet quire , an extra
../data/lines/d01/d01-123/d01-123-06.png: sheet glued on might have to be gummed on
../data/lines/d01/d01-123/d01-123-07.png: over the binding , or the whole codex rebound .

../data/lines/d05/d05-008/d05-008-00.png: The new century opened with James 1 ascending
../data/lines/d05/d05-008/d05-008-01.png: the throne . He was quite prepared to be
../data/lines/d05/d05-008/d05-008-02.png: tolerant towards Rome though the Gunpowder Plot
../data/lines/d05/d05-008/d05-008-03.png: spoiled that . The Puritans had high hopes , for
../data/lines/d05/d05-008/d05-008-04.png: James had grown up in Presbyterian Scotland ,
../data/lines/d05/d05-008/d05-008-05.png: but those hopes were dashed . True , a new Prayer
../data/lines/d05/d05-008/d05-008-06.png: Book was issued in 1604 but the Puritans
../data/lines/d05/d05-013/d05-013-00.png: They objected to the word Absolution . So the phrase ' or
../data/lines/d05/d05-013/d05-013-01.png: the remission of sins ' was added . But Absolution remained .
../data/lines/d05/d05-013/d05-013-02.png: They objected to the word Confirmation . So the phrase
../data/lines/d05/d05-013/d05-013-03.png: ' or the laying on of hands upon children baptized and
../data/lines/d05/d05-013/d05-013-04.png: able to render an account of their faith according
../data/lines/d05/d05-013/d05-013-05.png: to the Catechism following ' were added . But Confirmation
../data/lines/d05/d05-013/d05-013-06.png: remained . Other changes in the Book were equally
../data/lines/d05/d05-013/d05-013-07.png: minor except for the new section on the Sacraments
../data/lines/d05/d05-021/d05-021-00.png: This indicated how ephemeral in the Church had
../data/lines/d05/d05-021/d05-021-01.png: been the mood which produced the Black Rubric , for
../data/lines/d05/d05-021/d05-021-02.png: it says that ' the Body and Blood of Christ , which are
../data/lines/d05/d05-021/d05-021-03.png: verily and indeed taken and received by the
../data/lines/d05/d05-021/d05-021-04.png: faithful in the Lord's Supper . ' It could hardly be more
../data/lines/d05/d05-021/d05-021-05.png: definite . It was at this time , too , that King James made
../data/lines/d05/d05-021/d05-021-06.png: himself immortal by becoming associated with
../data/lines/d05/d05-021/d05-021-07.png: a Bible translation - the Authorized Version
../data/lines/d05/d05-025/d05-025-00.png: In that year Shakespeare had just turned
../data/lines/d05/d05-025/d05-025-01.png: forty and had written Hamlet two years
../data/lines/d05/d05-025/d05-025-02.png: before . Bacon was at work and Milton was
../data/lines/d05/d05-025/d05-025-03.png: just learning to read . James was followed by
../data/lines/d05/d05-025/d05-025-04.png: Charles , in whose reign came the Scottish
../data/lines/d05/d05-025/d05-025-05.png: Prayer Book in 1637 . Significantly this made
../data/lines/d05/d05-025/d05-025-06.png: a deliberate return to the Book of 1549 and
../data/lines/d05/d05-025/d05-025-07.png: became the foster mother of some of the most
../data/lines/d05/d05-025/d05-025-08.png: important Prayer Books in the Anglican
../data/lines/d05/d05-030/d05-030-00.png: Forever associated with Charles is Archbishop Laud ,
../data/lines/d05/d05-030/d05-030-01.png: now so much nobler a figure than former historians
../data/lines/d05/d05-030/d05-030-02.png: led us to believe . Laud was enthusiastically hated
../data/lines/d05/d05-030/d05-030-03.png: by Calvinists and Puritans , and the sentiment was
../data/lines/d05/d05-030/d05-030-04.png: mutual . But Laud was no Romanizer . One of his
../data/lines/d05/d05-030/d05-030-05.png: first public acts was a hard-hitting battle with
../data/lines/d05/d05-030/d05-030-06.png: the Jesuit , Fisher . But anyone who was friendly
../data/lines/d05/d05-030/d05-030-07.png: with James and Charles , the Puritans argued ,
../data/lines/d05/d05-040/d05-040-00.png: Or when he found cock-fighting going on in church ?
../data/lines/d05/d05-040/d05-040-01.png: Laud made a positive approach . He set out to increase
../data/lines/d05/d05-040/d05-040-02.png: a sense of reverence . The Prayer Book was to be respected
../data/lines/d05/d05-040/d05-040-03.png: and so was the office of a bishop . Altars should be
../data/lines/d05/d05-040/d05-040-04.png: altars and not any broken down , transportable
../data/lines/d05/d05-040/d05-040-05.png: table which was handy for the most improbable uses .
../data/lines/d06/d06-000/d06-000-00.png: In the first place it is not a great deal
../data/lines/d06/d06-000/d06-000-01.png: of use telling even children , as I have
../data/lines/d06/d06-000/d06-000-02.png: already suggested , not to be silly or
../data/lines/d06/d06-000/d06-000-03.png: to pull themselves together . Far better
../data/lines/d06/d06-000/d06-000-04.png: to help them to face whatever it is that
../data/lines/d06/d06-000/d06-000-05.png: is worrying them , to find the original
../data/lines/d06/d06-000/d06-000-06.png: cause and then deal with it ; show it
../data/lines/d06/d06-000/d06-000-07.png: up either for the sham it is - and many
../data/lines/d06/d06-003/d06-003-00.png: Even worse is to laugh . Tremendous damage may be done to a child
../data/lines/d06/d06-003/d06-003-01.png: by laughing at what are very real fears . As adults , we know
../data/lines/d06/d06-003/d06-003-02.png: that their fears are groundless , indeed to us they appear laughable ,
../data/lines/d06/d06-003/d06-003-03.png: but to a child they are very real . Not that I am suggesting
../data/lines/d06/d06-003/d06-003-04.png: that children should be molly-coddled - they must be made
../data/lines/d06/d06-003/d06-003-05.png: to face their fears , to see through them and come out on the
../data/lines/d06/d06-008/d06-008-00.png: To ridicule them only pushes them farther
../data/lines/d06/d06-008/d06-008-01.png: into themselves , so that they become
../data/lines/d06/d06-008/d06-008-02.png: unable to speak about it to anybody and
../data/lines/d06/d06-008/d06-008-03.png: the seeds of any amount of trouble are sown ,
../data/lines/d06/d06-008/d06-008-04.png: the harvest of which may still be being
../data/lines/d06/d06-008/d06-008-05.png: reaped at forty or fifty . Far better to
../data/lines/d06/d06-008/d06-008-06.png: agree with a child that a particular
../data/lines/d06/d06-008/d06-008-07.png: situation is frightening , and then to face
../data/lines/d06/d06-008/d06-008-08.png: it together until the child can see how
../data/lines/d06/d06-011/d06-011-01.png: all the elements of fear can arise suddenly ,
../data/lines/d06/d06-011/d06-011-02.png: it is a good idea to condition a child
../data/lines/d06/d06-011/d06-011-03.png: to some extent against it . To keep a child
../data/lines/d06/d06-011/d06-011-04.png: of twelve or thirteen under the
../data/lines/d06/d06-011/d06-011-06.png: happens is not merely dishonest , it
../data/lines/d06/d06-011/d06-011-07.png: is unwise . As I shall suggest in a
../data/lines/d06/d06-011/d06-011-08.png: later chapter there are some situations
../data/lines/d06/d06-015/d06-015-00.png: A little more honesty , even if one refrains from going into
../data/lines/d06/d06-015/d06-015-01.png: too many details , would help many a child to make a
../data/lines/d06/d06-015/d06-015-02.png: proper adjustment to life as it grows up . Let us look
../data/lines/d06/d06-015/d06-015-03.png: at Jesus . We do not , I think , see there a life without fear .
../data/lines/d06/d06-015/d06-015-04.png: There are several instances where he seemed unable to go
../data/lines/d06/d06-020/d06-020-00.png: In Gethsemane He prayed that the cup
../data/lines/d06/d06-020/d06-020-01.png: should pass from Him . Jesus shows us
../data/lines/d06/d06-020/d06-020-02.png: the way to face life . To see all the latent
../data/lines/d06/d06-020/d06-020-03.png: frightening possibilities and yet by facing
../data/lines/d06/d06-020/d06-020-04.png: them and knowing God is with us and
../data/lines/d06/d06-020/d06-020-05.png: that , with Him , there is nothing that can
../data/lines/d06/d06-020/d06-020-06.png: finally defeat us . More than that , that God
../data/lines/d06/d06-020/d06-020-07.png: has something important to do with our
../data/lines/d06/d06-020/d06-020-08.png: lives and that the nearer we get to Him ,
../data/lines/d06/d06-025/d06-025-00.png: ... Today A wonderful thought In the
../data/lines/d06/d06-025/d06-025-01.png: dawn was given ... And the thought

../data/lines/d06/d06-025/d06-025-03.png: my hand ; That my hand is big Big ,
../data/lines/d06/d06-025/d06-025-04.png: Because of the plan That God , Who
../data/lines/d06/d06-025/d06-025-05.png: dwells in my hand , Knows this
../data/lines/d06/d06-025/d06-025-06.png: secret plan , Of the things He will
../data/lines/d06/d06-025/d06-025-07.png: do for the world Using my hand .

../data/lines/d06/d06-030/d06-030-00.png: Amen . MOST people would probably regard tiredness as a
../data/lines/d06/d06-030/d06-030-01.png: purely physical thing . The cure for which is sleep . This is only
../data/lines/d06/d06-030/d06-030-02.png: partly true . Many people wake up tired of a morning and no
../data/lines/d06/d06-030/d06-030-03.png: amount of rest seems to make any difference . Sleep , to be
../data/lines/d06/d06-030/d06-030-04.png: effective , must be of that child-like quality which comes
../data/lines/d06/d06-037/d06-037-00.png: To others , the long hours of the night bring
../data/lines/d06/d06-037/d06-037-01.png: only a disturbed tossing and turning
../data/lines/d06/d06-037/d06-037-02.png: which causes them to wake feeling worse
../data/lines/d06/d06-037/d06-037-03.png: than when they went to bed . We may begin
../data/lines/d06/d06-037/d06-037-04.png: to understand this a little better when we
../data/lines/d06/d06-037/d06-037-05.png: realize that tiredness itself is largely in
../data/lines/d06/d06-037/d06-037-06.png: the mind . Very few people , under normal
../data/lines/d06/d06-037/d06-037-07.png: conditions , work themselves to a standstill .
../data/lines/d06/d06-041/d06-041-00.png: The mind tires first and conveys the impression
../data/lines/d06/d06-041/d06-041-01.png: of tiredness to the body . This can be proved by
../data/lines/d06/d06-041/d06-041-02.png: noting the effect of a new stimulus on some-
../data/lines/d06/d06-041/d06-041-03.png: body who feels thoroughly tired . Suppose
../data/lines/d06/d06-041/d06-041-04.png: a mother has news late at night that her
../data/lines/d06/d06-041/d06-041-05.png: child is in danger . She will undertake a
../data/lines/d06/d06-041/d06-041-06.png: journey which , an hour before , she would
../data/lines/d06/d06-046/d06-046-00.png: Even more simply , test your own reactions
../data/lines/d06/d06-046/d06-046-01.png: to different situations . There are some which
../data/lines/d06/d06-046/d06-046-02.png: bring on an almost immediate feeling of
../data/lines/d06/d06-046/d06-046-03.png: tiredness - such as when your wife mentions
../data/lines/d06/d06-046/d06-046-04.png: the washing-up - while others , if they
../data/lines/d06/d06-046/d06-046-05.png: refer to something you like doing , bring a
../data/lines/d06/d06-046/d06-046-06.png: veritable surge of energy . Many a girl who
../data/lines/d06/d06-046/d06-046-07.png: is ' too tired to help mum ' will later jump
../data/lines/d06/d06-046/d06-046-08.png: up with no apparent tiredness at all when
../data/lines/d06/d06-046/d06-046-09.png: her boy friend calls and go for a long walk .
../data/lines/d06/d06-050/d06-050-00.png: Nor is she necessarily being deceitful . She really did feel tired
../data/lines/d06/d06-050/d06-050-01.png: until the mind got the necessary injection of a fresh - and an
../data/lines/d06/d06-050/d06-050-02.png: attractive - interest ! Tiredness has , therefore , as much to do
../data/lines/d06/d06-050/d06-050-03.png: with our mental state as with our physical exhaustion . A
../data/lines/d06/d06-050/d06-050-04.png: disturbed mind can bring the healthiest body to a sense
../data/lines/d06/d06-050/d06-050-05.png: of fatigue . They wonder why they get no rest at night ,
../data/lines/d06/d06-056/d06-056-00.png: They drag themselves around and can become
../data/lines/d06/d06-056/d06-056-01.png: a burden to their families and their friends .
../data/lines/d06/d06-056/d06-056-02.png: Any mental confusion can cause this and
../data/lines/d06/d06-056/d06-056-03.png: the best way is probably to seek advice .
../data/lines/d06/d06-056/d06-056-04.png: As we are unable to cure our own bodies
../data/lines/d06/d06-056/d06-056-05.png: if the cause of our pain is too deep seated ,
../data/lines/d06/d06-056/d06-056-06.png: so we are unable to cure our own minds ,
../data/lines/d06/d06-056/d06-056-07.png: if the trouble is a complicated one
../data/lines/d06/d06-060/d06-060-00.png: One of the greatest steps forward that has been
../data/lines/d06/d06-060/d06-060-01.png: made this century is the way in which illness
../data/lines/d06/d06-060/d06-060-02.png: of the mind is no longer feared or shunned ,
../data/lines/d06/d06-060/d06-060-03.png: and is in fact no differently regarded than
../data/lines/d06/d06-060/d06-060-04.png: physical illness . There is , nevertheless , a
../data/lines/d06/d06-060/d06-060-05.png: great deal of tiredness which comes from
../data/lines/d06/d06-060/d06-060-06.png: no major complication but results from an
../data/lines/d06/d06-060/d06-060-07.png: inability to deal with life , especially under
../data/lines/d06/d06-060/d06-060-08.png: the diverse pattern which is the twentieth
../data/lines/d06/d06-063/d06-063-00.png: In the days when most people were born ,
../data/lines/d06/d06-063/d06-063-01.png: lived and died within the boundaries of
../data/lines/d06/d06-063/d06-063-02.png: the village , it was not difficult for anybody
../data/lines/d06/d06-063/d06-063-03.png: to live a day at a time . Even those who
../data/lines/d06/d06-063/d06-063-04.png: held a high and responsible office lived in
../data/lines/d06/d06-063/d06-063-05.png: far greater simplicity than their successors .
../data/lines/d06/d06-063/d06-063-06.png: When news from the Continent took days ,
../data/lines/d06/d06-063/d06-063-07.png: from America weeks , from the Far East ,
../data/lines/d06/d06-063/d06-063-08.png: months , even a Prime Minister could go to
../data/lines/d06/d06-063/d06-063-09.png: sleep in blissful ignorance of what might
../data/lines/d06/d06-063/d06-063-10.png: be happening at the other end of England ,
../data/lines/d06/d06-067/d06-067-00.png: In other ways , too , life for the ordinary
../data/lines/d06/d06-067/d06-067-02.png: that it taxes the mind . Two hundred
../data/lines/d06/d06-067/d06-067-03.png: years ago , men lived and worked
../data/lines/d06/d06-067/d06-067-04.png: in one place , their lives were of one
../data/lines/d06/d06-067/d06-067-05.png: piece . Now a man may live twenty ,
../data/lines/d06/d06-067/d06-067-06.png: thirty even sixty miles from his
../data/lines/d06/d06-067/d06-067-07.png: work . The only connexion is the
../data/lines/d06/d06-067/d06-067-08.png: pipeline of the railway on which they
../data/lines/d06/d06-072/d06-072-00.png: In many cases , their homes know little of
../data/lines/d06/d06-072/d06-072-01.png: their place of work and their associates at
../data/lines/d06/d06-072/d06-072-02.png: the office or works wonder what they
../data/lines/d06/d06-072/d06-072-03.png: are possibly like in the surroundings of their
../data/lines/d06/d06-072/d06-072-04.png: homes . It is easy , desperately easy , to lead
../data/lines/d06/d06-072/d06-072-05.png: a ' double ' life without ever deliberately
../data/lines/d06/d06-072/d06-072-06.png: planning to do so or in fact being conscious
../data/lines/d06/d06-072/d06-072-07.png: of what is going on . It is easier to live life in
../data/lines/d06/d06-072/d06-072-08.png: compartments but over the years it builds up ,
../data/lines/d06/d06-072/d06-072-09.png: and to do so inevitably builds up tensions which
../data/lines/d06/d06-076/d06-076-00.png: Can we then frame some ' rules ' which may enable us to live life
../data/lines/d06/d06-076/d06-076-01.png: as fully as possible , without having our energy sapped by un-
../data/lines/d06/d06-076/d06-076-02.png: necessary weariness . ( a ) Order makes for a decrease in tiredness .
../data/lines/d06/d06-076/d06-076-03.png: We have a saying ' My head will never save my feet ' . Time
../data/lines/d06/d06-076/d06-076-04.png: after time we forget something and have to go back
../data/lines/d06/d06-076/d06-076-05.png: upstairs or down to the shops .
../data/lines/d06/d06-082/d06-082-00.png: If we ever stopped to consider how much energy - and time -
../data/lines/d06/d06-082/d06-082-01.png: we lose this way in the course of a day we would be
