../data/lines/d06/d06-082/d06-082-02.png: staggered . Some of it is inevitable , and we do not want to
../data/lines/d06/d06-082/d06-082-03.png: become too pernickety . Nevertheless , we could all probably
../data/lines/d06/d06-082/d06-082-04.png: be a little more orderly for we so frequently just muddle
../data/lines/d06/d06-086/d06-086-00.png: The housewife would find life far less tiring
../data/lines/d06/d06-086/d06-086-01.png: if she made a list , followed a routine of work
../data/lines/d06/d06-086/d06-086-02.png: rather than getting from one thing to the next .
../data/lines/d06/d06-086/d06-086-03.png: The business man would find that he reached
../data/lines/d06/d06-086/d06-086-04.png: the end of the day with far less strain if
../data/lines/d06/d06-086/d06-086-05.png: he was a little more systematic . To drift
../data/lines/d06/d06-086/d06-086-06.png: aimlessly along is more wearying than any-
../data/lines/d06/d06-086/d06-086-07.png: thing else . If we would only sit down and
../data/lines/d06/d06-086/d06-086-08.png: write out all the necessary jobs waiting to
../data/lines/d06/d06-086/d06-086-09.png: be done and then work quietly through them ,
../data/lines/d06/d06-086/d06-086-10.png: we would find life considerably less exhausting
../data/lines/d06/d06-091/d06-091-00.png: There may be some who will argue that
../data/lines/d06/d06-091/d06-091-01.png: routine destroys the soul . It is so easy ,
../data/lines/d06/d06-091/d06-091-02.png: they say , to get into a rut . Save us
../data/lines/d06/d06-091/d06-091-03.png: from the school curriculum and even
../data/lines/d06/d06-091/d06-091-04.png: worse the school system whereby for
../data/lines/d06/d06-091/d06-091-06.png: exactly what , on any given day of the
../data/lines/d06/d06-091/d06-091-07.png: week , they are going to have . If - such
../data/lines/d06/d06-091/d06-091-08.png: a critic may say - you are calling
../data/lines/d06/d06-091/d06-091-09.png: us to adventure , do not strangle us before
../data/lines/d06/d06-091/d06-091-10.png: we start by putting us into a strait-jacket
../data/lines/d06/d06-096/d06-096-00.png: I am more than conscious of this . How anybody
../data/lines/d06/d06-096/d06-096-01.png: can go through the same routine day in and day
../data/lines/d06/d06-096/d06-096-02.png: out for forty years I find difficult to understand .
../data/lines/d06/d06-096/d06-096-03.png: A lot of it is inevitable so that industry and
../data/lines/d06/d06-096/d06-096-04.png: commerce may be kept going - though if ever
../data/lines/d06/d06-096/d06-096-05.png: it becomes possible to work out a system
../data/lines/d06/d06-096/d06-096-06.png: of ' staggered ' hours it may do an immense
../data/lines/d06/d06-096/d06-096-07.png: amount of good over and above relieving
../data/lines/d06/d06-100/d06-100-00.png: As it is , with so much of our life already
../data/lines/d06/d06-100/d06-100-01.png: in a predetermined groove , I would
../data/lines/d06/d06-100/d06-100-02.png: hardly like to add further to the dullness
../data/lines/d06/d06-100/d06-100-03.png: which it engenders . But I am not arguing
../data/lines/d06/d06-100/d06-100-04.png: for this . I know how much of a drag it can be
../data/lines/d06/d06-100/d06-100-05.png: and I was interested some little while
../data/lines/d06/d06-100/d06-100-06.png: ago to hear of a school who tried a six-
../data/lines/d06/d06-104/d06-104-00.png: They only worked , of course , a five-
../data/lines/d06/d06-104/d06-104-01.png: day week so that in the first week
../data/lines/d06/d06-104/d06-104-02.png: Monday to Friday were days one
../data/lines/d06/d06-104/d06-104-03.png: to five of the timetable , the following
../data/lines/d06/d06-104/d06-104-04.png: Monday was day six and Tuesday
../data/lines/d06/d06-104/d06-104-05.png: started day one again and so on .
../data/lines/d06/d06-104/d06-104-06.png: By this means they avoided each
../data/lines/d06/d06-104/d06-104-07.png: week being the same with a pupil
../data/lines/d06/d06-104/d06-104-09.png: would be on Friday afternoon at
../data/lines/d06/d06-107/d06-107-00.png: It was a little complicated to work ,
../data/lines/d06/d06-107/d06-107-01.png: of course , and there had to be a big
../data/lines/d06/d06-107/d06-107-02.png: notice in the entrance saying which
../data/lines/d06/d06-107/d06-107-03.png: day of the timetable it was - but
../data/lines/d06/d06-107/d06-107-04.png: it added immensely to the interest
../data/lines/d06/d06-107/d06-107-05.png: and kept everybody on their toes .
../data/lines/d06/d06-107/d06-107-06.png: To have order does not mean getting
../data/lines/d06/d06-107/d06-107-07.png: into a dull routine . I have great
../data/lines/d06/d06-107/d06-107-09.png: who does not always want to do
../data/lines/d06/d06-111/d06-111-00.png: I would not want to either , but if she wants to get through
../data/lines/d06/d06-111/d06-111-01.png: the day without becoming exhausted , she will be well advised to
../data/lines/d06/d06-111/d06-111-02.png: sit down quietly and make a list of everything she has got to
../data/lines/d06/d06-111/d06-111-03.png: do , note the order in which they can most conveniently be
../data/lines/d06/d06-111/d06-111-04.png: done ( or must be done because of other predetermined factors
../data/lines/d06/d06-111/d06-111-05.png: - you must , for example , do your shopping on the morning of
../data/lines/d06/d06-113/d06-113-00.png: She will , in fact , be surprised at what peace
../data/lines/d06/d06-113/d06-113-01.png: of mind ensues . ( b ) Concentrate on one
../data/lines/d06/d06-113/d06-113-02.png: thing at a time . A list or a plan enables us to
../data/lines/d06/d06-113/d06-113-03.png: put all our energies into the particular
../data/lines/d07/d07-082/d07-082-00.png: ( Actually , the Mishnah quotes two further proof
../data/lines/d07/d07-082/d07-082-01.png: texts and the Gemara explains why these ,
../data/lines/d07/d07-082/d07-082-02.png: too , are necessary , but a careful examination
../data/lines/d07/d07-082/d07-082-03.png: of that passage makes it clear that these are
../data/lines/d07/d07-082/d07-082-04.png: not quoted here because they are not
../data/lines/d07/d07-082/d07-082-05.png: necessary to prove the point made by
../data/lines/d07/d07-082/d07-082-06.png: R. Joshua b. Levi . ) Finally , we note that
../data/lines/d07/d07-082/d07-082-07.png: the comment of Rami bar Rabh is quoted
../data/lines/d07/d07-085/d07-085-00.png: From the above it follows that here , once again ,
../data/lines/d07/d07-085/d07-085-01.png: we have a good illustration of how a
../data/lines/d07/d07-085/d07-085-02.png: sugya has been fashioned from material
../data/lines/d07/d07-085/d07-085-03.png: already in the hands of the Redactors .
../data/lines/d07/d07-085/d07-085-04.png: The sugya is built around the saying of
../data/lines/d07/d07-085/d07-085-05.png: R. Joshua b. Levi . The proof text for the
../data/lines/d07/d07-085/d07-085-06.png: reading of the Book of Esther is quoted
../data/lines/d07/d07-085/d07-085-07.png: with the comment given by Samuel .
../data/lines/d07/d07-089/d07-089-00.png: ( This is probably to be understood as a well-
../data/lines/d07/d07-089/d07-089-01.png: known comment on the verse ; quoted by
../data/lines/d07/d07-089/d07-089-02.png: Samuel in support of his thesis and quoted
../data/lines/d07/d07-089/d07-089-03.png: by the Gemara in support of R. Joshua b.
../data/lines/d07/d07-089/d07-089-04.png: Levi's thesis ! ) The proof text of greeting by
../data/lines/d07/d07-089/d07-089-05.png: the divine Name is taken from the Mishnah .
../data/lines/d07/d07-089/d07-089-06.png: There is no reference to the Mishnah here
../data/lines/d07/d07-089/d07-089-07.png: because the Mishnah deals with the
../data/lines/d07/d07-089/d07-089-08.png: actual practice of greeting by the divine
../data/lines/d07/d07-089/d07-089-09.png: Name and the Gemara here quotes the
../data/lines/d07/d07-089/d07-089-10.png: texts to support the thesis of R. Joshua b. Levi .
../data/lines/d07/d07-093/d07-093-00.png: The question and answer with regard to the
../data/lines/d07/d07-093/d07-093-01.png: need for the text of the angel are quoted
../data/lines/d07/d07-093/d07-093-02.png: here in the same words in which they are
../data/lines/d07/d07-093/d07-093-03.png: quoted in the discussion on the Mishnah .
../data/lines/d07/d07-093/d07-093-04.png: This can either mean that both sugyas are
../data/lines/d07/d07-093/d07-093-06.png: answer or that our sugya is quoting from
../data/lines/d07/d07-093/d07-093-07.png: the longer sugya which deals with all
../data/lines/d07/d07-093/d07-093-08.png: four texts quoted in the Mishnah .
../data/lines/d07/d07-096/d07-096-00.png: Or it is possible that our sugya contains the
../data/lines/d07/d07-096/d07-096-01.png: original question and answer and this is quoted
../data/lines/d07/d07-096/d07-096-02.png: in the other sugya . ( This can be supported by the
../data/lines/d07/d07-096/d07-096-03.png: use of the expression : ' Boaz did it of his own
../data/lines/d07/d07-096/d07-096-04.png: accord but there was no approval of his action
../data/lines/d07/d07-096/d07-096-05.png: in Heaven ' in both sugyoth . Such an
../data/lines/d07/d07-096/d07-096-06.png: expression appears to have been framed in
../data/lines/d07/d07-096/d07-096-07.png: response to the particular point at issue here ,
../data/lines/d07/d07-096/d07-096-09.png: in the decision of the human court . )
../data/lines/d07/d07-100/d07-100-00.png: The proof text of bringing the tithe to the Temple
../data/lines/d07/d07-100/d07-100-01.png: is then quoted and the interpretation of the
../data/lines/d07/d07-100/d07-100-02.png: latter part of the verse by Rami bar Rabh
../data/lines/d07/d07-100/d07-100-03.png: is added , not because this is at all relevant
../data/lines/d07/d07-100/d07-100-04.png: to the discussion but because it was
../data/lines/d07/d07-100/d07-100-06.png: become so well known that it was
../data/lines/d07/d07-100/d07-100-08.png: itself was quoted , almost as if it were a
../data/lines/d07/d07-102/d07-102-00.png: The Gemara continues with a saying of the
../data/lines/d07/d07-102/d07-102-02.png: ' The Holy Spirit manifested itself in three places :
../data/lines/d07/d07-102/d07-102-03.png: the court of Shem , the court of Samuel of Ramah ,
../data/lines/d07/d07-102/d07-102-04.png: and the court of Solomon . ' The place of this
../data/lines/d07/d07-102/d07-102-05.png: saying here is obvious , it follows naturally
../data/lines/d07/d07-102/d07-102-06.png: on the saying of R. Joshua b. Levi which
../data/lines/e01/e01-014/e01-014-00.png: We know from the diaries of Samuel Pepys
../data/lines/e01/e01-014/e01-014-01.png: that he was a great man for lace - paying
../data/lines/e01/e01-014/e01-014-02.png: as much as 3 for a lace collar . But this
../data/lines/e01/e01-014/e01-014-03.png: didn't mean he was prepared to do as much
../data/lines/e01/e01-014/e01-014-04.png: for his lady , for he records testily : ' My wife
../data/lines/e01/e01-014/e01-014-05.png: and I fell out about my not being willing
../data/lines/e01/e01-018/e01-018-00.png: We read , with sympathy , an advertisement in the
../data/lines/e01/e01-018/e01-018-01.png: reign of Charles 2 stating : ' Lost : a lawn 1hand-
../data/lines/e01/e01-018/e01-018-02.png: kercher with a broad hem laced round with
../data/lines/e01/e01-018/e01-018-03.png: fine Point lace about four fingers broad ' and
../data/lines/e01/e01-018/e01-018-04.png: among the effects left by Nell Gwyn is an
../data/lines/e01/e01-018/e01-018-05.png: unpaid bill for ' scarlet satin shoes with
../data/lines/e01/e01-018/e01-018-06.png: silver lace ' . The records of these tender trifles
../data/lines/e01/e01-018/e01-018-07.png: are very touching but then lace does place
../data/lines/e01/e01-022/e01-022-00.png: Lucky indeed are the families that
../data/lines/e01/e01-022/e01-022-01.png: possess a heritage of lace . A lace
../data/lines/e01/e01-022/e01-022-02.png: bridal veil handed down from mother
../data/lines/e01/e01-022/e01-022-04.png: robe that each generation wears in turn -
../data/lines/e01/e01-022/e01-022-05.png: these are proud possessions , linked to the
../data/lines/e01/e01-025/e01-025-00.png: But lace-making is by no means a lost
../data/lines/e01/e01-025/e01-025-01.png: art . It suffered a decline and fell into
../data/lines/e01/e01-025/e01-025-02.png: lamentably low standards in the fussy
../data/lines/e01/e01-025/e01-025-04.png: but it would take more than a temporary
../data/lines/e01/e01-025/e01-025-05.png: lapse in good taste to destroy this lovely ,
../data/lines/e01/e01-025/e01-025-06.png: viable craft . It has , in fact , readily
../data/lines/e01/e01-025/e01-025-07.png: adapted itself to modern tastes and the ill-
../data/lines/e01/e01-025/e01-025-08.png: ustrations in the following pages will show
../data/lines/e01/e01-025/e01-025-09.png: how completely it is in sympathy with con-
../data/lines/e01/e01-029/e01-029-00.png: It will be seen how , with bold design
../data/lines/e01/e01-029/e01-029-01.png: and rich colour , knitting , crochet and
../data/lines/e01/e01-029/e01-029-02.png: tatting in fine and medium-weight cottons
../data/lines/e01/e01-029/e01-029-03.png: can give striking individuality to many things
../data/lines/e01/e01-029/e01-029-04.png: in the home . Chairbacks , cushions , tablecloths ,
../data/lines/e01/e01-029/e01-029-05.png: to mention only three - how satisfying it is
../data/lines/e01/e01-029/e01-029-06.png: to avoid the ready-made in these and by
../data/lines/e01/e01-032/e01-032-00.png: The more delicate patterns and finer
../data/lines/e01/e01-032/e01-032-01.png: threads may be reserved to bring a light
../data/lines/e01/e01-032/e01-032-02.png: and lovely touch to personal possessions -
../data/lines/e01/e01-032/e01-032-03.png: a lace border to a handkerchief , fine-lace
../data/lines/e01/e01-032/e01-032-04.png: insertion on a petticoat or blouse , a tatted edge
../data/lines/e01/e01-032/e01-032-05.png: to a collar ; these add a charming , feminine
../data/lines/e01/e01-032/e01-032-06.png: distinction that nothing else can give .
../data/lines/e01/e01-032/e01-032-07.png: Although we assess lace-making as one of
../data/lines/e01/e01-032/e01-032-08.png: the feminine skills , a number of the well-loved
../data/lines/e01/e01-032/e01-032-09.png: traditional patterns that we follow today were ,
../data/lines/e01/e01-032/e01-032-10.png: in fact , the brain-children of inventive men .
../data/lines/e01/e01-035/e01-035-00.png: For in the old order of things , men designed
../data/lines/e01/e01-035/e01-035-01.png: and worked lace as well as women and
../data/lines/e01/e01-035/e01-035-02.png: special schools were set up to teach lace-
../data/lines/e01/e01-035/e01-035-03.png: making not only to young girls , but to little
../data/lines/e01/e01-035/e01-035-04.png: boys as well . Whole families made their
../data/lines/e01/e01-035/e01-035-06.png: a folklore of song , festival and courtship grew
../data/lines/e01/e01-050/e01-050-00.png: During the sixteenth century a considerable
../data/lines/e01/e01-050/e01-050-01.png: amount of crochet was produced in the
../data/lines/e01/e01-050/e01-050-02.png: convents of Europe . Without doubt it was the
../data/lines/e01/e01-050/e01-050-03.png: nuns who carried the craft to Ireland . There it
../data/lines/e01/e01-050/e01-050-04.png: was developed into quite an elaborate and distinctive
../data/lines/e01/e01-050/e01-050-05.png: form with rosettes , leaves and lace fillings . During
../data/lines/e01/e01-050/e01-050-06.png: the time of Victoria this gentle craft was
../data/lines/e01/e01-055/e01-055-00.png: One can remember with horror the pictures of the
../data/lines/e01/e01-055/e01-055-02.png: complete with heavy crochet antimacassars , mantel-
../data/lines/e01/e01-055/e01-055-03.png: piece covers with a fringing of clumsy bobbles and
../data/lines/e01/e01-055/e01-055-04.png: numerous other crocheted pieces . It was some years
../data/lines/e01/e01-055/e01-055-05.png: after the Victorian period that designers realised
../data/lines/e01/e01-055/e01-055-06.png: the potentialities of the craft , and crochet was
../data/lines/e01/e01-055/e01-055-07.png: revived with designs suitable for contemporary
../data/lines/e01/e01-055/e01-055-08.png: trends . Crochet today has a variety of uses , and
../data/lines/e01/e01-055/e01-055-09.png: has even stepped into the field of high fashion .
../data/lines/e01/e01-059/e01-059-00.png: In some of the elegant boutiques of Paris
../data/lines/e01/e01-059/e01-059-02.png: texture , are sold at a very high price . With a
../data/lines/e01/e01-059/e01-059-03.png: little time and concentration the woman at home can
../data/lines/e01/e01-059/e01-059-04.png: produce fashion articles as elegant as those of
../data/lines/e01/e01-059/e01-059-05.png: Paris - a blouse , delicate gloves or a fine
../data/lines/e01/e01-059/e01-059-06.png: edging for collar , cuffs or a handkerchief .
../data/lines/e01/e01-062/e01-062-00.png: In the home , crochet lace can be used to make
../data/lines/e01/e01-062/e01-062-01.png: tablecloths , traycloths and runners , and edgings
../data/lines/e01/e01-062/e01-062-02.png: from heavy to fine can fulfil a variety of
../data/lines/e01/e01-062/e01-062-03.png: functions . The art of crochet is not difficult and
../data/lines/e01/e01-062/e01-062-04.png: it is reasonably quick to work . In the following
../data/lines/e01/e01-062/e01-062-05.png: pages simple diagrams and instructions are given
../data/lines/e01/e01-062/e01-062-06.png: to enable the beginner to master all the essential
../data/lines/e01/e01-081/e01-081-00.png: First launder crochet and then pin to the required
../data/lines/e01/e01-081/e01-081-01.png: shape , ensuring that all lines of the crochet are
../data/lines/e01/e01-081/e01-081-02.png: accurate . Place crochet in correct position on linen and
../data/lines/e01/e01-081/e01-081-03.png: secure with pins . Run a line of basting stitches
../data/lines/e01/e01-081/e01-081-04.png: on the linen following the outline of the crochet edges
../data/lines/e01/e01-081/e01-081-05.png: which are to be attached to the linen . Remove crochet .
../data/lines/e01/e01-086/e01-086-00.png: Two methods can be used to join the crochet to the linen :
../data/lines/e01/e01-086/e01-086-01.png: ( a ) Button Stitch round the outline of basting stitches ,
../data/lines/e01/e01-086/e01-086-02.png: the knotted part of the button stitch lying on the
../data/lines/e01/e01-086/e01-086-03.png: outside edge . Oversew crochet to button stitch .
../data/lines/e01/e01-086/e01-086-04.png: ( b ) Turn under a small hem , with fold lying on line
../data/lines/e01/e01-086/e01-086-05.png: of basting stitches . Work a row of dc all round
../data/lines/e01/e01-086/e01-086-06.png: this hem , with 3 dc at each corner .
../data/lines/e01/e01-092/e01-092-00.png: Oversew crochet to the dc. A household word ,
../data/lines/e01/e01-092/e01-092-02.png: are of the utmost importance to the worker .
../data/lines/e01/e01-092/e01-092-03.png: It washes beautifully , never loses its colour
../data/lines/e01/e01-092/e01-092-04.png: nor becomes ' stringy ' , is very elastic and
../data/lines/e01/e01-092/e01-092-05.png: preserves the beauty of the design . It is easy
../data/lines/e01/e01-092/e01-092-06.png: to work with , soft , glossy and of uniform
../data/lines/e01/e01-092/e01-092-07.png: thickness - it is the ideal crochet thread .
../data/lines/e01/e01-102/e01-102-00.png: Remember that texture plays an important part in
../data/lines/e01/e01-102/e01-102-01.png: the beauty of crochet . The finer mercerised threads
../data/lines/e01/e01-102/e01-102-02.png: are more effective for the delicate designs used for
../data/lines/e01/e01-102/e01-102-03.png: tablecloths , doilies , edgings and accessories , while
../data/lines/e01/e01-102/e01-102-04.png: the heavier threads are used for bedspreads ,
../data/lines/e01/e01-102/e01-102-05.png: chairbacks , luncheon mats , etc. Crochet hooks
../data/lines/e01/e01-102/e01-102-06.png: are made of steel , composition or bone . Steel
../data/lines/e01/e01-102/e01-102-07.png: crochet hooks range in size from number 3/0 ,
../data/lines/e01/e01-102/e01-102-08.png: the largest , to number 8 , the smallest .
../data/lines/e01/e01-107/e01-107-00.png: Each size of hook is made for use with a certain
../data/lines/e01/e01-107/e01-107-01.png: size of thread . To ensure the correct results ,
../data/lines/e01/e01-107/e01-107-02.png: it is important that you use the size of hook
../data/lines/e01/e01-107/e01-107-03.png: specified in the directions . These are the
../data/lines/e01/e01-107/e01-107-04.png: correct numbers to use with Mercer-Crochet :
../data/lines/e01/e01-107/e01-107-05.png: Directions are given for a small practice
../data/lines/e01/e01-107/e01-107-06.png: piece for each stitch that you learn . When
../data/lines/e01/e01-107/e01-107-07.png: you have become proficient in these
../data/lines/e01/e01-107/e01-107-08.png: stitches , attractive articles can be made
../data/lines/e01/e01-107/e01-107-09.png: from the directions included in this book .
../data/lines/e01/e01-113/e01-113-00.png: 1 . Grasp thread near end between thumb
../data/lines/e01/e01-113/e01-113-01.png: and forefinger . 2 . Make a loop by
../data/lines/e01/e01-113/e01-113-02.png: lapping long thread over short thread .
../data/lines/e01/e01-113/e01-113-03.png: 3 . Hold loop in place between thumb
../data/lines/e01/e01-113/e01-113-05.png: of broad bar of hook as you would a
../data/lines/e01/e01-113/e01-113-06.png: pencil . Bring middle finger forward to
../data/lines/e01/e01-119/e01-119-00.png: 2 . Insert hook through loop and under long
../data/lines/e01/e01-119/e01-119-01.png: thread . Catch long end of thread ( Fig. 2 ) .
../data/lines/e01/e01-119/e01-119-02.png: Draw loop through . 3 . Do not remove hook
../data/lines/e01/e01-119/e01-119-03.png: from thread . Pull short end and ball thread
../data/lines/e01/e01-119/e01-119-04.png: in opposite directions to bring loop close around
../data/lines/e01/e01-119/e01-119-05.png: the end of the hook , but not too tight
../data/lines/e01/e01-119/e01-119-06.png: ( Fig. 3 ) . Loop thread round little finger ,
../data/lines/e01/e01-119/e01-119-07.png: across palm and behind forefinger ( Fig. 4 ) .
../data/lines/e02/e02-000/e02-000-00.png: A great deal of modern furniture has tapered
../data/lines/e02/e02-000/e02-000-01.png: legs , and in reproduction period pieces they
../data/lines/e02/e02-000/e02-000-02.png: are frequently used . The simpler varieties are
../data/lines/e02/e02-000/e02-000-03.png: extremely easy to work , the four sides being
../data/lines/e02/e02-000/e02-000-04.png: simply planed to give the required taper . In
../data/lines/e02/e02-000/e02-000-05.png: the more elaborate varieties , however , a toe is
../data/lines/e02/e02-000/e02-000-06.png: worked in the solid , and this certainly
../data/lines/e02/e02-014/e02-014-00.png: For short ones a smoothing plane can be used .
../data/lines/e02/e02-014/e02-014-01.png: The gauge can now be used to nick in the tapers
../data/lines/e02/e02-014/e02-014-02.png: on the newly planed surfaces , and these treated
../data/lines/e02/e02-014/e02-014-03.png: as before . It is unnecessary to mark the taper with
../data/lines/e02/e02-014/e02-014-04.png: the straight-edge as one relies upon the truth
../data/lines/e02/e02-014/e02-014-05.png: of the plane sole to make the tapered surfaces
../data/lines/e02/e02-018/e02-018-00.png: A glance at the gauge marks at the bottom
../data/lines/e02/e02-018/e02-018-01.png: end reveals when the required amount
../data/lines/e02/e02-018/e02-018-02.png: has been removed , and if care is taken
../data/lines/e02/e02-018/e02-018-03.png: to stop the plane short of the squared
../data/lines/e02/e02-018/e02-018-04.png: pencil line at the top , the work will be
../data/lines/e02/e02-018/e02-018-05.png: accurate . The straight-edge can be used
../data/lines/e02/e02-018/e02-018-06.png: to test the straightness of the sides .
../data/lines/e02/e02-021/e02-021-01.png: complete any mortising that may be
../data/lines/e02/e02-021/e02-021-02.png: needed at the top before the tapering is
../data/lines/e02/e02-021/e02-021-03.png: begun . Some plain tapered legs have
../data/lines/e02/e02-021/e02-021-04.png: the taper on the two inner faces only ,
../data/lines/e02/e02-021/e02-021-05.png: the outer surfaces being vertical as
../data/lines/e02/e02-021/e02-021-06.png: at ( B ) , Fig. 1 . To make a leg such as
../data/lines/e02/e02-021/e02-021-07.png: that at ( D ) , Fig. 1 , the square is first
../data/lines/e02/e02-021/e02-021-08.png: marked out as at ( A ) , Fig. 3 .
../data/lines/e02/e02-025/e02-025-01.png: the top member of the toe are
../data/lines/e02/e02-025/e02-025-02.png: needed as well as the upper ex-
../data/lines/e02/e02-025/e02-025-03.png: tent of the taper , and in
../data/lines/e02/e02-025/e02-025-04.png: this case it is necessary to
../data/lines/e02/e02-025/e02-025-05.png: mark in the line of the taper
../data/lines/e02/e02-025/e02-025-07.png: as at ( B ) , Fig. 3 . A saw cut is
../data/lines/e02/e02-025/e02-025-08.png: made at the upper toe line
../data/lines/e02/e02-025/e02-025-09.png: exactly down to the taper line ,
../data/lines/e02/e02-074/e02-074-00.png: But why woodwork in particular ? Well , there
../data/lines/e02/e02-074/e02-074-01.png: are many reasons . Wood is in good and
../data/lines/e02/e02-074/e02-074-02.png: common supply ; it lends itself to making
../data/lines/e02/e02-074/e02-074-04.png: furniture , fitments , garden items , toys , etc. ;
../data/lines/e02/e02-074/e02-074-05.png: it enables results to be obtained fairly
../data/lines/e02/e02-074/e02-074-06.png: quickly ; it is less expensive than most
../data/lines/e02/e02-074/e02-074-07.png: other materials ; it is a pleasant material
../data/lines/e02/e02-074/e02-074-08.png: to work with ; and , although it does
../data/lines/e02/e02-074/e02-074-09.png: create a certain amount of mess , it is
../data/lines/e02/e02-074/e02-074-10.png: all clean and easily cleared away .
../data/lines/e02/e02-082/e02-082-00.png: This last point is certainly important because almost
../data/lines/e02/e02-082/e02-082-01.png: everyone has come to recognise that machines
../data/lines/e02/e02-082/e02-082-02.png: are not only an economic necessity , but that a
../data/lines/e02/e02-082/e02-082-03.png: great deal of drudgery can be avoided by the
../data/lines/e02/e02-082/e02-082-04.png: installation of a power tool . As an elementary
../data/lines/e02/e02-082/e02-082-05.png: example , surely no one can pretend to enjoy
../data/lines/e02/e02-082/e02-082-06.png: ripping out parts from hardwood . Most men
../data/lines/e02/e02-082/e02-082-07.png: would unhesitatingly use a machine if it
../data/lines/e02/e02-086/e02-086-00.png: Coming now to the actual tools and their cost , we begin
../data/lines/e02/e02-086/e02-086-01.png: with what we have called a bare minimum kit . Probably
../data/lines/e02/e02-086/e02-086-02.png: most men have some of the tools already . It will enable
../data/lines/e02/e02-086/e02-086-03.png: a man to make simple , straight-forward things , and in
../data/lines/e02/e02-086/e02-086-04.png: any case may be regarded as a good beginning to
../data/lines/e02/e02-086/e02-086-05.png: which other tools can be added as the need arises . The
../data/lines/e02/e02-086/e02-086-06.png: nature of the work will probably dictate the additions
../data/lines/e02/e02-086/e02-086-07.png: to be made , but as a guide we have given a fuller kit
../data/lines/e02/e02-086/e02-086-08.png: which increases the range of things that can be
../data/lines/e02/e02-091/e02-091-00.png: As a still further development , we follow
../data/lines/e02/e02-091/e02-091-01.png: with a good basic kit , which includes
../data/lines/e02/e02-091/e02-091-02.png: the fuller kit ( which in its turn , of course ,
../data/lines/e02/e02-091/e02-091-04.png: With this the vast majority of jobs
../data/lines/e02/e02-091/e02-091-05.png: can be done , though for advanced
../data/lines/e02/e02-094/e02-094-00.png: Lastly , we suggest certain power tools and
../data/lines/e02/e02-094/e02-094-01.png: machines , the choice of which will
../data/lines/e02/e02-094/e02-094-02.png: depend partly upon the space available
../data/lines/e02/e02-094/e02-094-03.png: in the workshop , the amount one
../data/lines/e02/e02-094/e02-094-04.png: is prepared to pay , and the type of
../data/lines/e02/e02-094/e02-094-05.png: work a man normally does . First ,
../data/lines/e02/e02-094/e02-094-06.png: however , a word of advice generally .
../data/lines/e02/e02-094/e02-094-07.png: Do not buy so-called cheap tools or
../data/lines/e02/e02-094/e02-094-08.png: machines . They never are cheap in the
../data/lines/e02/e02-094/e02-094-09.png: long run . They may be inaccurate ,
../data/lines/e02/e02-100/e02-100-00.png: Most tools have to lead an intensive life , and faults
../data/lines/e02/e02-100/e02-100-01.png: in design or quality soon become apparent . It is far
../data/lines/e02/e02-100/e02-100-02.png: better to pay the fair price for a tool of good
../data/lines/e02/e02-100/e02-100-03.png: quality , and not handicap yourself from the start .
../data/lines/e02/e02-100/e02-100-04.png: To put it in a slightly different way , do not allow
../data/lines/e02/e02-100/e02-100-05.png: yourself to blame the tools when the job does
../data/lines/e02/e02-117/e02-117-00.png: Many men with only limited accommodation
../data/lines/e02/e02-117/e02-117-01.png: have to do their woodwork on the kitchen table .
../data/lines/e02/e02-117/e02-117-02.png: Providing this is sound , some perfectly good
../data/lines/e02/e02-117/e02-117-03.png: work can be done on it , but the usual problems
../data/lines/e02/e02-117/e02-117-04.png: are those of the vice , the bench stop , and storage
../data/lines/e02/e02-117/e02-117-05.png: place for tools . The combined bench top and
../data/lines/e02/e02-117/e02-117-06.png: tool cupboard shown here has been specially
../data/lines/e04/e04-000/e04-000-00.png: HERE is a project that will be welcomed by the
../data/lines/e04/e04-000/e04-000-01.png: family man or father-to-be . Unlike many
../data/lines/e04/e04-000/e04-000-02.png: commercial articles , this chair is solidly built and
../data/lines/e04/e04-000/e04-000-03.png: capable of withstanding the heavy handling of the
../data/lines/e04/e04-000/e04-000-04.png: most destructive youngster . Almost any available
../data/lines/e04/e04-000/e04-000-05.png: timber can be used but Parana pine is
../data/lines/e04/e04-000/e04-000-06.png: recommended , being cheap , easy to work , and
../data/lines/e04/e04-004/e04-004-00.png: Start by making the two side frames from 1 in. by 1 1/4 in. planed
../data/lines/e04/e04-004/e04-004-01.png: timber as shown in Fig. 1 . Although the timber will have already
../data/lines/e04/e04-004/e04-004-02.png: been machine planed , remember to go over each piece with
../data/lines/e04/e04-004/e04-004-03.png: a smoothing plane , otherwise the marks left by the cutters
../data/lines/e04/e04-004/e04-004-04.png: will show up after painting . The dimensions given enable the
../data/lines/e04/e04-004/e04-004-05.png: feeding tray to slide over a 30 in. table , but the height
../data/lines/e04/e04-008/e04-008-00.png: All the joints are simple halving joints glued and pinned ,
../data/lines/e04/e04-008/e04-008-01.png: which should nevertheless be cut with care to ensure a neat
../data/lines/e04/e04-008/e04-008-02.png: appearance . The side frames are joined by four cross pieces
../data/lines/e04/e04-008/e04-008-03.png: each 1 1/4 in. by 1/2 in. by 14 in. which fit into the recesses ( C ) ,
../data/lines/e04/e04-011/e04-011-00.png: See Fig. 2 . These are then glued and
../data/lines/e04/e04-011/e04-011-01.png: pinned into place . A similar piece of 1 in.
../data/lines/e04/e04-011/e04-011-02.png: by 1 1/4 in. by 14 in. timber is fixed across
../data/lines/e04/e04-011/e04-011-03.png: the end of the feeding tray as seen in
../data/lines/e04/e04-011/e04-011-04.png: Fig. 3 which also shows how a piece of
../data/lines/e04/e04-011/e04-011-05.png: hardboard is covered with plastic material
../data/lines/e04/e04-011/e04-011-06.png: for easy cleaning and then fixed underneath
../data/lines/e04/e04-011/e04-011-07.png: the frame with panel pins to complete
../data/lines/e04/e04-015/e04-015-00.png: Cut this piece of hardboard so that it
../data/lines/e04/e04-015/e04-015-01.png: fits up against the front legs of the
../data/lines/e04/e04-015/e04-015-02.png: chair . The seat rests across the upper two
../data/lines/e04/e04-015/e04-015-03.png: cross pieces and is made of 1/2 in. plywood
../data/lines/e04/e04-015/e04-015-04.png: glued and panel pinned in position , measurements
../data/lines/e04/e04-015/e04-015-05.png: being taken directly from the work . Fig. 4
../data/lines/e04/e04-015/e04-015-06.png: shows the framework for the back which
../data/lines/e04/e04-015/e04-015-07.png: is made from 1 1/4 in. by 1/2 in. timber .
../data/lines/e04/e04-019/e04-019-00.png: The amount of the backward tilt and
../data/lines/e04/e04-019/e04-019-01.png: also the height is left to personal choice
../data/lines/e04/e04-019/e04-019-02.png: and the width is best taken directly
../data/lines/e04/e04-019/e04-019-03.png: from the work to ensure a good fit .
../data/lines/e04/e04-019/e04-019-04.png: Fix the piece A to the sides first
../data/lines/e04/e04-019/e04-019-05.png: with glue and panel pins and then fit
../data/lines/e04/e04-019/e04-019-06.png: the frame together with the piece
../data/lines/e04/e04-019/e04-019-07.png: B temporarily in place on the chair
../data/lines/e04/e04-022/e04-022-00.png: Decide on the required angle of slope ,
../data/lines/e04/e04-022/e04-022-01.png: keeping B flat on the chair seat , and mark
../data/lines/e04/e04-022/e04-022-02.png: off the exact position of B on the side
../data/lines/e04/e04-022/e04-022-03.png: pieces . These can then be cut at the correct
../data/lines/e04/e04-022/e04-022-04.png: angle and B is glued and nailed in place .
../data/lines/e04/e04-022/e04-022-05.png: A piece of hardboard is then cut and pinned
../data/lines/e04/e04-022/e04-022-06.png: to the frame and its edges planed off
../data/lines/e04/e04-026/e04-026-00.png: Finally attach the back firmly to the sides with
../data/lines/e04/e04-026/e04-026-01.png: screws driven from the inside . The footrest is a
../data/lines/e04/e04-026/e04-026-02.png: piece of timber 14 in. long and about 1/2 in.
../data/lines/e04/e04-026/e04-026-03.png: by 4 in. attached to the front legs with a pair
../data/lines/e04/e04-026/e04-026-04.png: of angle irons as shown in Fig. 5 . When determining
../data/lines/e04/e04-026/e04-026-05.png: the position of the footrest , do not place too near
../data/lines/e04/e04-026/e04-026-06.png: the seat to allow for the growth of baby's legs .
../data/lines/e04/e04-030/e04-030-00.png: To complete the job , screw two fittings to the
../data/lines/e04/e04-030/e04-030-01.png: inside of the chair arms about 2 1/2 in. from the
../data/lines/e04/e04-030/e04-030-02.png: back to hold the baby's safety harness . These can be
../data/lines/e04/e04-030/e04-030-03.png: made by shaping and soldering two pieces of stout
../data/lines/e04/e04-030/e04-030-04.png: wire as shown in Fig. 6 . Make sure that these
../data/lines/e04/e04-030/e04-030-05.png: are well secured as they will have to withstand
../data/lines/e04/e04-030/e04-030-06.png: considerable pulling as the child becomes older .
../data/lines/e04/e04-034/e04-034-00.png: Punch in all nail and panel pin heads and fill the holes
../data/lines/e04/e04-034/e04-034-01.png: with plastic wood . Then thoroughly glasspaper the whole
../data/lines/e04/e04-034/e04-034-02.png: framework and round off any sharp edges ( such as the
../data/lines/e04/e04-034/e04-034-03.png: edge of the seat , feeding tray , etc ) . Fill the grain with a
../data/lines/e04/e04-034/e04-034-04.png: woodfiller in the usual way and paint the frame in
../data/lines/e04/e04-034/e04-034-05.png: a suitable pastel shade , using a contrasting colour
../data/lines/e04/e04-034/e04-034-06.png: for the seat and the back which can be decorated with
../data/lines/e04/e04-038/e04-038-00.png: Avoid using lead-based paint as this could prove poisonous
../data/lines/e04/e04-038/e04-038-01.png: if junior decides to bite the chair . Finally , it is as well
../data/lines/e04/e04-038/e04-038-02.png: to cover the footrest with rubber or any such protective
../data/lines/e04/e04-038/e04-038-03.png: material that might be available as otherwise the
../data/lines/e04/e04-038/e04-038-04.png: paint would soon be scratched off .
../data/lines/e04/e04-038/e04-038-05.png: ( J.H.P. ) BUILDING your own boat is a most
../data/lines/e04/e04-043/e04-043-00.png: Here are the plans of a very seaworthy little
../data/lines/e04/e04-043/e04-043-01.png: rowing dinghy many of which I have built and
../data/lines/e04/e04-043/e04-043-02.png: sold . It is especially designed for simplicity in
../data/lines/e04/e04-043/e04-043-03.png: construction , cheapness and lightness of weight ,
../data/lines/e04/e04-043/e04-043-04.png: and measures approximately 8 ft. by 4 ft. She
../data/lines/e04/e04-043/e04-043-05.png: weighs only 60 lb. but can carry three people
../data/lines/e04/e04-043/e04-043-06.png: and an outboard motor with a comfortable
../data/lines/e04/e04-052/e04-052-00.png: For instance , in Canada we use galvanised nails
../data/lines/e04/e04-052/e04-052-01.png: in place of screws . We just bend them over and clamp
../data/lines/e04/e04-052/e04-052-02.png: firmly by using a hammer on each side . Over here I 've
../data/lines/e04/e04-052/e04-052-03.png: always used brass screws , which are more expensive . The first
../data/lines/e04/e04-052/e04-052-04.png: job is to make your moulds . In Fig. 1 it quotes 3/4 in. five-ply ,
../data/lines/e04/e04-052/e04-052-05.png: but to save money any scrap may be used , and if this
../data/lines/e04/e04-052/e04-052-06.png: is nailed and glued together strongly , it may be marked
../data/lines/e04/e04-058/e04-058-00.png: If you do not have a wooden floor on which to anchor
../data/lines/e04/e04-058/e04-058-01.png: the moulds , make a frame of rough lumber as shown in
../data/lines/e04/e04-058/e04-058-02.png: Fig. 2 . The main idea is to have the moulds standing as
../data/lines/e04/e04-058/e04-058-03.png: rigid as possible , for it is on these you will be building
../data/lines/e04/e04-058/e04-058-04.png: and shaping your little craft , upside-down . For cheapness
../data/lines/e04/e04-058/e04-058-05.png: I recommend using Douglas Fir Plywood from British
../data/lines/e04/e04-062/e04-062-00.png: This is hot pressed and resin bonded to ensure
../data/lines/e04/e04-062/e04-062-01.png: a permanently water proof glue line . Be sure to
../data/lines/e04/e04-062/e04-062-02.png: see that the edge bears the mark , P.M.B.C. Exterior .
../data/lines/e04/e04-062/e04-062-03.png: This may be bought at any good timber merchants .
../data/lines/e04/e04-062/e04-062-04.png: The transoms can be made of any sound five-ply
../data/lines/e04/e04-062/e04-062-05.png: wood of the same make , or oak or mahogany . For the
../data/lines/e04/e04-062/e04-062-06.png: last one I made , I used the two flaps from an old
../data/lines/e04/e04-062/e04-062-07.png: mahogany table which I bought at a sale for one
../data/lines/e04/e04-068/e04-068-00.png: I have also included a sketch of paddles I make for
../data/lines/e04/e04-068/e04-068-01.png: rowing this dinghy ( Fig. 3 ) . They are very simple , cheap
../data/lines/e04/e04-068/e04-068-02.png: and easy to make . As will be seen from the plan
../data/lines/e04/e04-068/e04-068-03.png: there is only a single gunwale on the outside .
../data/lines/e04/e04-068/e04-068-04.png: I find that the type of rowlock we use in Canada
../data/lines/e04/e04-068/e04-068-05.png: is difficult to obtain here and expensive . I overcome
../data/lines/e04/e04-068/e04-068-06.png: this in another way as shown in Fig. 4 .
../data/lines/e04/e04-079/e04-079-01.png: transoms to shape as in the
../data/lines/e04/e04-079/e04-079-03.png: a wooden floor you can use
../data/lines/e04/e04-079/e04-079-04.png: ' A ' frames fastened to the floor
../data/lines/e04/e04-079/e04-079-05.png: if not , use a strong horizontal
../data/lines/e04/e04-079/e04-079-06.png: frame that will sit firmly on
../data/lines/e04/e04-079/e04-079-07.png: the ground or concrete floor . I
../data/lines/e04/e04-079/e04-079-08.png: use a heavy old base as in
../data/lines/e04/e04-083/e04-083-00.png: The edges of the transoms should be bevelled to
../data/lines/e04/e04-083/e04-083-01.png: correspond to the sides and bottom of the boat .
../data/lines/e04/e04-083/e04-083-02.png: Don't forget to cut out on each side of each mould
../data/lines/e04/e04-083/e04-083-03.png: to allow for the chines to rest in these
../data/lines/e04/e04-083/e04-083-04.png: notches , as they are not fastened to the
../data/lines/e04/e04-083/e04-083-05.png: moulds , which will only be used whilst
../data/lines/e04/e04-086/e04-086-00.png: The chine is the long stringer on each side which
../data/lines/e04/e04-086/e04-086-01.png: is joined to both transoms and lies in the grooves
../data/lines/e04/e04-086/e04-086-02.png: cut in the moulds . Each chine is made of oak ,
../data/lines/e04/e04-086/e04-086-03.png: ash , spruce or any long grained flexible wood . I
../data/lines/e04/e04-086/e04-086-04.png: prefer spruce when available . As will be seen
../data/lines/e04/e04-086/e04-086-05.png: in the plan , the transoms have a frame 1 in. by 1 in.
../data/lines/e04/e04-091/e04-091-00.png: The chines are morticed into this and butt up
../data/lines/e04/e04-091/e04-091-01.png: against the transom . Start at the bow and
../data/lines/e04/e04-091/e04-091-02.png: spring them both at the same time over the
../data/lines/e04/e04-091/e04-091-03.png: slots cut in the moulds and into the notches
../data/lines/e04/e04-091/e04-091-04.png: cut for this purpose in the stern or after
../data/lines/e04/e04-091/e04-091-05.png: transom framing . Glue , screw and make fast .
../data/lines/e04/e04-095/e04-095-00.png: The skeleton of the boat will now take shape ,
../data/lines/e04/e04-095/e04-095-01.png: and this is the time to check before making fast
../data/lines/e04/e04-095/e04-095-02.png: to see that nothing is distorted . Ensure that
../data/lines/e04/e04-095/e04-095-03.png: the outside measurements from transom to transom
../data/lines/e04/e04-095/e04-095-04.png: are equal on each side and that the transoms
../data/lines/e04/e04-095/e04-095-05.png: are parallel horizontally . Next bevel the chines
../data/lines/e04/e04-095/e04-095-06.png: with a plane so that the bottom will fit snugly .
../data/lines/e04/e04-099/e04-099-00.png: Cut out the bottom and sides accurately from the
../data/lines/e04/e04-099/e04-099-01.png: plan measurements but leave sufficient margin for
../data/lines/e04/e04-099/e04-099-02.png: planing after fixing to the boat . Use your two
../data/lines/e04/e04-099/e04-099-03.png: lengths of 8 ft. by 4 ft. ply for this
../data/lines/e04/e04-099/e04-099-04.png: purpose , the sides from one , and the bottom from
../data/lines/e04/e04-099/e04-099-05.png: the other . If care is taken not to waste the
../data/lines/e04/e04-099/e04-099-06.png: ply , plenty of material is left over for the thwarts .
../data/lines/e04/e04-103/e04-103-00.png: Having trimmed up the chines , we are now ready
../data/lines/e04/e04-103/e04-103-01.png: to plank the sides . Start again at the bows ,
../data/lines/e04/e04-103/e04-103-02.png: clamping into position with a ' D ' clamp . Bend
../data/lines/e04/e04-103/e04-103-03.png: round the frame to the stern and clamp there . If
../data/lines/e04/e04-103/e04-103-04.png: you have a third clamp use it in the centre as
../data/lines/e04/e04-103/e04-103-05.png: well . After generously covering with glue , screw
../data/lines/e04/e04-103/e04-103-06.png: the sides to the transom framing and the chine .
../data/lines/e04/e04-109/e04-109-00.png: Use 5/8 by No. 4 gauge screws ( brass ) or nail
../data/lines/e04/e04-109/e04-109-01.png: with inch and a quarter galvanized nails , if
../data/lines/e04/e04-109/e04-109-02.png: you are doing it that way . Use flat head screws
../data/lines/e04/e04-109/e04-109-03.png: about 4 in. apart and do not counter-sink in
../data/lines/e04/e04-109/e04-109-04.png: the 1/4 in. ply . Make a very small hole for
../data/lines/e04/e04-109/e04-109-05.png: the screw to allow for a good grip . Remember
../data/lines/e04/e04-114/e04-114-00.png: Clean up with the plane ready for the bottom ,
../data/lines/e04/e04-114/e04-114-01.png: which is cut in one piece . It should overlap just a
../data/lines/e04/e04-114/e04-114-02.png: trifle ; this can be cleaned up later . As you are
../data/lines/e04/e04-114/e04-114-03.png: screwing and gluing this piece to the chines it is
../data/lines/e04/e04-114/e04-114-04.png: necessary to be careful not to miss the chine with
../data/lines/e04/e04-114/e04-114-05.png: the screws . I prefer spacing screws 3 in. apart for
../data/lines/e04/e04-114/e04-114-06.png: the bottom , both for screwing to the chines and
../data/lines/e04/e04-119/e04-119-00.png: Again , don't forget to glue . Now put on the keel and
../data/lines/e04/e04-119/e04-119-01.png: the rubbing strakes and you are ready to lift the boat off
../data/lines/e04/e04-119/e04-119-02.png: the moulds . You won't want them again for this boat , so
../data/lines/e04/e04-119/e04-119-03.png: shift them right out of the way . Place the boat right side
../data/lines/e04/e04-119/e04-119-04.png: up on two boxes or trestles of convenient height for
../data/lines/e04/e04-124/e04-124-00.png: Fix on the gunwales and insert the thwarts ( seats )
../data/lines/e04/e04-124/e04-124-01.png: taking care to reinforce the sides of the dinghy at the seats
../data/lines/e04/e04-124/e04-124-02.png: with vertical members as shown in the plans . Make the
../data/lines/e04/e04-124/e04-124-03.png: four blocks for the rowlocks and mark their positions
../data/lines/e04/e04-124/e04-124-04.png: before riveting on the gunwales so that you do not put
../data/lines/e04/e04-124/e04-124-05.png: a rivet where you will have to cut out the inside ( gunwale )
../data/lines/e04/e04-127/e04-127-00.png: I rivet my gunwales together through the side of the hull
../data/lines/e04/e04-127/e04-127-01.png: with copper nails and roves . It greatly improves the
../data/lines/e04/e04-127/e04-127-02.png: appearance and the strength . Paint with good marine primer ,
../data/lines/e04/e04-127/e04-127-03.png: undercoat and at least one coat of finishing paint .
../data/lines/e04/e04-127/e04-127-04.png: WHEN an assortment of differently coloured materials are cut
../data/lines/e04/e04-127/e04-127-05.png: into a variety of shapes they can be combined by either
../data/lines/e04/e04-132/e04-132-00.png: While these may ultimately be made into a picture
../data/lines/e04/e04-132/e04-132-01.png: for framing and hanging on a wall , they may
../data/lines/e04/e04-132/e04-132-02.png: also be arranged into a design , and the
../data/lines/e04/e04-132/e04-132-03.png: resulting panel utilized for decorating a useful
../data/lines/e06/e06-000/e06-000-00.png: This could hardly happen without the
../data/lines/e06/e06-000/e06-000-01.png: herring having some orientation with the
../data/lines/e06/e06-000/e06-000-02.png: sea bottom . It means that the crowding
../data/lines/e06/e06-000/e06-000-03.png: is caused during the daytime , and that
../data/lines/e06/e06-000/e06-000-04.png: the herring must continue to migrate over
../data/lines/e06/e06-000/e06-000-05.png: the ground as well as in midwater and
../data/lines/e06/e06-000/e06-000-06.png: during the swim ( the swim at East Anglia
../data/lines/e06/e06-003/e06-003-00.png: Thus we can see that herring
../data/lines/e06/e06-003/e06-003-03.png: helped and hindered by water flow ,
../data/lines/e06/e06-003/e06-003-04.png: are also closely related to the sea-bed
../data/lines/e06/e06-003/e06-003-06.png: great fisheries that depend on them :
../data/lines/e06/e06-003/e06-003-07.png: the Fladen Ground ( where again most big
../data/lines/e06/e06-003/e06-003-08.png: shots are taken on the edges ) , the Gut ,
../data/lines/e06/e06-003/e06-003-09.png: a deep-water channel to the Dogger where
../data/lines/e06/e06-003/e06-003-10.png: the herring spawn along the northern
../data/lines/e06/e06-006/e06-006-00.png: The effect of bottom congestion due to
../data/lines/e06/e06-006/e06-006-01.png: the light pressure is inevitably mixed
../data/lines/e06/e06-006/e06-006-02.png: with that of the suitability of ground
../data/lines/e06/e06-006/e06-006-03.png: for spawning . Both result in crowding ,
../data/lines/e06/e06-006/e06-006-04.png: so there is no need to try to separate
../data/lines/e06/e06-006/e06-006-05.png: them - thank Heaven ! A good picture of
../data/lines/e06/e06-006/e06-006-06.png: this is seen on the 150 miles of spawning
../data/lines/e06/e06-006/e06-006-07.png: grounds from the Viking in the north down
../data/lines/e06/e06-006/e06-006-08.png: to the Klondykes and the Reef along
../data/lines/e06/e06-006/e06-006-09.png: the western edge of the Norwegian
../data/lines/e06/e06-010/e06-010-00.png: In this 200-fathom trench the herring do not touch the bottom .
../data/lines/e06/e06-010/e06-010-01.png: Their descent stops at the end of the light pressure . But
../data/lines/e06/e06-010/e06-010-02.png: they migrate easterly to the Norwegian side , or westerly , until
../data/lines/e06/e06-010/e06-010-03.png: in the shallower water the mile wide layers disappear from the
../data/lines/e06/e06-010/e06-010-04.png: echo-sounders . Bottom crowding comes when they cannot reach
../data/lines/e06/e06-010/e06-010-05.png: their optimum depth ; and this coincides with the suitable
../data/lines/e06/e06-010/e06-010-06.png: gravelly soil of these many roughs where the spring-
../data/lines/e06/e06-015/e06-015-01.png: and fishing gear leads to an overall
../data/lines/e06/e06-015/e06-015-03.png: The details are harder still to see .
../data/lines/e06/e06-015/e06-015-04.png: Drift Effects . At East Anglia , for instance ,
../data/lines/e06/e06-015/e06-015-05.png: shoals that gather at the Knoll or
../data/lines/e06/e06-015/e06-015-06.png: other banks are most of them
../data/lines/e06/e06-015/e06-015-09.png: spawn . Some will spawn at the
../data/lines/e06/e06-021/e06-021-00.png: So the arrival of any particular shoal
../data/lines/e06/e06-021/e06-021-01.png: fish at a certain spawning ground may
../data/lines/e06/e06-021/e06-021-02.png: be accidental . Yet there will always be some
../data/lines/e06/e06-021/e06-021-03.png: that find it if enough are travelling , just as
../data/lines/e06/e06-021/e06-021-04.png: the robin who gets back exactly may be
../data/lines/e06/e06-021/e06-021-05.png: only one among thousands who do not .
../data/lines/e06/e06-021/e06-021-06.png: But this southerly migration is not
../data/lines/e06/e06-021/e06-021-08.png: the drift , it probably has a survival value
../data/lines/e06/e06-021/e06-021-09.png: in ensuring that the fry after hatching
../data/lines/e06/e06-021/e06-021-10.png: are drifted back into the normal home
../data/lines/e06/e06-026/e06-026-02.png: are biased to east or west by the
../data/lines/e06/e06-026/e06-026-04.png: are well known to bring good
../data/lines/e06/e06-026/e06-026-06.png: water that is blown offshore must
../data/lines/e06/e06-026/e06-026-07.png: be replaced by an underflow bringing
../data/lines/e06/e06-026/e06-026-08.png: with it the herring to the Norfolk
../data/lines/e06/e06-030/e06-030-00.png: Easterly winds , on the other hand ,
../data/lines/e06/e06-030/e06-030-01.png: mean no herring along the shore , as
../data/lines/e06/e06-030/e06-030-02.png: recent years have shown . A succession
../data/lines/e06/e06-030/e06-030-03.png: of winds is needed for this effect of
../data/lines/e06/e06-030/e06-030-04.png: course - one breeze will not do it ,
../data/lines/e06/e06-030/e06-030-05.png: though a very hard westerly will
../data/lines/e06/e06-030/e06-030-06.png: often start off the " local " herring ;
../data/lines/e06/e06-030/e06-030-07.png: but quite apart from this wind effect
../data/lines/e06/e06-030/e06-030-08.png: there is an easterly drift special
../data/lines/e06/e06-030/e06-030-09.png: to this rump of coastline , caused by
../data/lines/e06/e06-030/e06-030-10.png: the meeting of water from north and south .
../data/lines/e06/e06-033/e06-033-00.png: Herring fishermen call this " the outset " . It
../data/lines/e06/e06-033/e06-033-01.png: is strongest at spring tides , when without
../data/lines/e06/e06-033/e06-033-02.png: wind you will " set " out - or drift to the east-
../data/lines/e06/e06-033/e06-033-03.png: ward , the length of half a fleet of nets -
../data/lines/e06/e06-033/e06-033-04.png: almost a mile on every tide at the Smith's
../data/lines/e06/e06-033/e06-033-05.png: Knoll . Without an explanation of how it
../data/lines/e06/e06-033/e06-033-06.png: works , it may well be that this outset , akin
../data/lines/e06/e06-033/e06-033-07.png: to the mouth of a great salmon river , has
../data/lines/e06/e06-033/e06-033-08.png: been the biggest factor through the ages
../data/lines/e06/e06-033/e06-033-09.png: in the constancy of this great herring fishery .
../data/lines/e06/e06-037/e06-037-00.png: The East Anglian behaviour ( see p. 82 )
../data/lines/e06/e06-037/e06-037-01.png: has always differed from that of the
../data/lines/e06/e06-037/e06-037-02.png: summer fisheries . There is the " swim "
../data/lines/e06/e06-037/e06-037-03.png: at slack waters , even in daylight
../data/lines/e06/e06-037/e06-037-05.png: when fish are caught only in the top
../data/lines/e06/e06-037/e06-037-06.png: few yards of netting . These and other
../data/lines/e06/e06-037/e06-037-08.png: to this fishery , which unfortunately seems
../data/lines/e06/e06-037/e06-037-09.png: to be dying out ; but a full discussion of
../data/lines/e06/e06-037/e06-037-10.png: them is beyond the present scope .
../data/lines/e06/e06-041/e06-041-01.png: that all fishing gear , when moving ,
../data/lines/e06/e06-041/e06-041-02.png: sends before it a kind of scaring effect ,
../data/lines/e06/e06-041/e06-041-03.png: probably through waves or vibrations in
../data/lines/e06/e06-041/e06-041-04.png: the water or along the ground .
../data/lines/e06/e06-041/e06-041-06.png: footrope of a trawl does this . Films
../data/lines/e06/e06-041/e06-041-07.png: have also shown plaice moving before
../data/lines/e06/e06-041/e06-041-08.png: a seine net in just the same way after
../data/lines/e06/e06-041/e06-041-09.png: being gathered inwards by the ropes .
../data/lines/e06/e06-046/e06-046-00.png: ( Just how the seine ropes do this is not yet proved ; it may
../data/lines/e06/e06-046/e06-046-01.png: be by actual contact , or by sight reaction to the disturbed
../data/lines/e06/e06-046/e06-046-02.png: sand ; or even in the case of flat fish , by vibrations
../data/lines/e06/e06-046/e06-046-03.png: through or along the bottom . ) But given such a bow
../data/lines/e06/e06-046/e06-046-04.png: wave of disturbance , it is obvious that without something
../data/lines/e06/e06-046/e06-046-05.png: to overcome its effect , very few fish would be caught .
../data/lines/e06/e06-049/e06-049-00.png: Let us consider first what would
../data/lines/e06/e06-049/e06-049-01.png: appear to be the simplest case -
../data/lines/e06/e06-049/e06-049-02.png: that of flat fish on the bottom .
../data/lines/e06/e06-049/e06-049-03.png: The evidence suggest that the fish are
../data/lines/e06/e06-049/e06-049-04.png: aware of the moving footrope before
../data/lines/e06/e06-049/e06-049-05.png: it reaches them . They move away before
../data/lines/e06/e06-049/e06-049-06.png: it , swimming at the same speed
../data/lines/e06/e06-049/e06-049-07.png: for an unknown period of time , until
../data/lines/e06/e06-049/e06-049-08.png: they become ( 1 ) tired , or ( 2 ) more used
../data/lines/e06/e06-053/e06-053-00.png: Then they stop swimming and are caught . In
../data/lines/e06/e06-053/e06-053-01.png: the seine-net film this usually seemed to
../data/lines/e06/e06-053/e06-053-02.png: happen just after the fish had risen above
../data/lines/e06/e06-053/e06-053-03.png: the footrope , and presumably out of its
../data/lines/e06/e06-053/e06-053-04.png: field of disturbance , or bow wave . This suggests
../data/lines/e06/e06-053/e06-053-05.png: that the wave might be transmitted by the
../data/lines/e06/e06-053/e06-053-06.png: sea-bed , though the footrope in this case
../data/lines/e06/e06-053/e06-053-07.png: was actually just off the bottom and was
../data/lines/e06/e06-070/e06-070-00.png: Actually the seine net has little or no cover .
../data/lines/e06/e06-070/e06-070-01.png: And in this film the rise of the fish was
../data/lines/e06/e06-070/e06-070-02.png: small , a matter of a foot or two . With round
../data/lines/e06/e06-070/e06-070-03.png: fish like haddock , which would hardly
../data/lines/e06/e06-070/e06-070-04.png: find safety on the bottom , this cover
../data/lines/e06/e06-070/e06-070-05.png: would seem to be even more essential ;
../data/lines/e06/e06-070/e06-070-06.png: but more films are needed to prove this .
../data/lines/e06/e06-070/e06-070-07.png: Cover in the fast-moving trawl is considered
../data/lines/e06/e06-070/e06-070-08.png: essential to catch round fish whose
../data/lines/e06/e06-070/e06-070-09.png: reaction to disturbance would be upwards .
../data/lines/e07/e07-000/e07-000-00.png: WE have not yet reached the stage in Britain
../data/lines/e07/e07-000/e07-000-01.png: when 50 planes are engaged in spreading 1,500 tons
../data/lines/e07/e07-000/e07-000-02.png: of DDT and fuel oil over 3 million acres or when
../data/lines/e07/e07-000/e07-000-03.png: 20 million acres are sprayed with dieldrin . An eye-
../data/lines/e07/e07-000/e07-000-04.png: witness described one sprayed area as literally rank with
../data/lines/e07/e07-000/e07-000-05.png: the stench of small game and birds dead from insecti-
../data/lines/e07/e07-003/e07-003-00.png: Wholesale chemical spraying , upsetting as it
../data/lines/e07/e07-003/e07-003-01.png: does the balance of nature by killing both pests
../data/lines/e07/e07-003/e07-003-02.png: and predators , is viewed with concern by a
../data/lines/e07/e07-003/e07-003-03.png: number of American State Research Stations . Not
../data/lines/e07/e07-003/e07-003-04.png: content with issuing bulletins on the dangers
../data/lines/e07/e07-003/e07-003-05.png: of the misuse of chemicals in agriculture ,
../data/lines/e07/e07-003/e07-003-06.png: some stations are carrying out useful research on
../data/lines/e07/e07-003/e07-003-07.png: pest control by biological means . Both native and
../data/lines/e07/e07-003/e07-003-08.png: imported predatory insects and insect pathogens
../data/lines/e07/e07-003/e07-003-09.png: are used in field trial tests .
../data/lines/e07/e07-007/e07-007-00.png: The biological control of pests in the garden
../data/lines/e07/e07-007/e07-007-01.png: is not new to the American gardener . Lady-
../data/lines/e07/e07-007/e07-007-02.png: birds figure in press advertisements , their
../data/lines/e07/e07-007/e07-007-03.png: sale being by the gallon . Praying mantis ( Mantis
../data/lines/e07/e07-007/e07-007-04.png: religiosa ) , both native and " immigrant " varieties ,
../data/lines/e07/e07-007/e07-007-05.png: are used by gardeners in all parts of the United
../data/lines/e07/e07-007/e07-007-06.png: States . Advertisements offer eggs of European ,
../data/lines/e07/e07-007/e07-007-07.png: Chinese or native forms of mantis .
../data/lines/e07/e07-012/e07-012-00.png: From the day it hatches in the spring
../data/lines/e07/e07-012/e07-012-01.png: until it dies in the late autumn , the
../data/lines/e07/e07-012/e07-012-02.png: praying mantis satisfies its voracity by
../data/lines/e07/e07-012/e07-012-04.png: may be consumed at one sitting and
../data/lines/e07/e07-012/e07-012-06.png: is able to keep a firm hold on one
../data/lines/e07/e07-012/e07-012-08.png: According to Dr. Max Beier in " Fang-
../data/lines/e07/e07-061/e07-061-00.png: Meanwhile Mr. Moncrieff had sent me an
../data/lines/e07/e07-061/e07-061-01.png: egg-case of the Chinese mantis . The
../data/lines/e07/e07-061/e07-061-02.png: first mantis had hatched from the very large
../data/lines/e07/e07-061/e07-061-03.png: egg-case on June 6 . Both the Chinese
../data/lines/e07/e07-061/e07-061-04.png: and Spanish mantis , in the young stage
../data/lines/e07/e07-061/e07-061-05.png: at any rate , are light brown in colour .
../data/lines/e07/e07-061/e07-061-06.png: Because of the cool , wet weather , I had great
../data/lines/e07/e07-061/e07-061-07.png: difficulty in breeding fruit flies and , after
../data/lines/e07/e07-061/e07-061-08.png: many of the mantis of both types had died
../data/lines/e07/e07-061/e07-061-09.png: in my Kilner jars , I poured living mantis
../data/lines/e07/e07-066/e07-066-00.png: A Gardeners Chronicle reader living in
../data/lines/e07/e07-066/e07-066-02.png: cooperate with me in studying praying
../data/lines/e07/e07-066/e07-066-03.png: mantis as a pest control in the cold
../data/lines/e07/e07-066/e07-066-04.png: greenhouse . Of the dozen Spanish mantis
../data/lines/e07/e07-066/e07-066-05.png: sent him by post on June 22 , only two or
../data/lines/e07/e07-066/e07-066-06.png: three survived the journey ; one thrived
../data/lines/e07/e07-066/e07-066-07.png: and the latest report I have is that
../data/lines/e07/e07-072/e07-072-00.png: DESPITE the steady influx of substitutes
../data/lines/e07/e07-072/e07-072-01.png: since the end of the war , clay pots are
../data/lines/e07/e07-072/e07-072-02.png: still in greatest demand . It is mostly
../data/lines/e07/e07-072/e07-072-03.png: in the smaller sizes that the substitutes
../data/lines/e07/e07-072/e07-072-05.png: numerous small clay pots are used each
../data/lines/e07/e07-072/e07-072-06.png: year , they are fewer than they were 10
../data/lines/e07/e07-072/e07-072-07.png: years ago . In the larger sizes there is still
../data/lines/e07/e07-072/e07-072-08.png: no real substitute for clay that can be
../data/lines/e07/e07-072/e07-072-09.png: obtained at a comparable price , except the
../data/lines/e07/e07-072/e07-072-10.png: bituminized paper pots which are used on
../data/lines/e07/e07-076/e07-076-00.png: The main disadvantage of the clay pot is its
../data/lines/e07/e07-076/e07-076-01.png: brittle nature ; even with reasonably careful
../data/lines/e07/e07-076/e07-076-02.png: handling , the annual losses are often around
../data/lines/e07/e07-076/e07-076-03.png: 10 per cent. , and where the handling and
../data/lines/e07/e07-076/e07-076-04.png: storage facilities are not too good , these
../data/lines/e07/e07-076/e07-076-05.png: losses will be even greater . This does not
../data/lines/e07/e07-076/e07-076-06.png: necessarily apply to the larger sizes , as
../data/lines/e07/e07-076/e07-076-07.png: they are not quite so fragile as the
../data/lines/e07/e07-076/e07-076-08.png: smaller ones and are not normally thrown
../data/lines/e07/e07-076/e07-076-09.png: about in quite the same way .
../data/lines/e07/e07-079/e07-079-00.png: The storage problem puts clay pots at a
../data/lines/e07/e07-079/e07-079-01.png: definite disadvantage . They are fairly heavy
../data/lines/e07/e07-079/e07-079-02.png: and difficult things to accommodate and
../data/lines/e07/e07-079/e07-079-03.png: they must have some protection from severe
../data/lines/e07/e07-079/e07-079-04.png: weather , which can be quite a headache in
../data/lines/e07/e07-079/e07-079-05.png: a small garden . While admitting that
../data/lines/e07/e07-079/e07-079-06.png: broken pots have on occasions provided
../data/lines/e07/e07-079/e07-079-07.png: artists with delightful studies , there is no
../data/lines/e07/e07-079/e07-079-08.png: doubt that a pile of badly stacked ,
../data/lines/e07/e07-079/e07-079-09.png: half-broken pots is an unlovely sight
../data/lines/e07/e07-083/e07-083-00.png: Every garden boy will agree that having to
../data/lines/e07/e07-083/e07-083-01.png: wash clay pots is a definite factor in
../data/lines/e07/e07-083/e07-083-02.png: favour of their abolition ; in fact one
../data/lines/e07/e07-083/e07-083-03.png: young man was so wholehearted about this
../data/lines/e07/e07-083/e07-083-04.png: a few years ago that he made the headlines
../data/lines/e07/e07-083/e07-083-05.png: for having smashed a large number # to
../data/lines/e07/e07-083/e07-083-06.png: relieve his feelings . On the small-to-medium
../data/lines/e07/e07-083/e07-083-07.png: establishment , it is a disagreeable chore
../data/lines/e07/e07-083/e07-083-08.png: which nobody tackles with any enthusiasm ,
../data/lines/e07/e07-083/e07-083-09.png: whereas on larger establishments the pots
../data/lines/e07/e07-083/e07-083-10.png: can be sterilized or washed by machine .
../data/lines/e07/e07-086/e07-086-00.png: It is not easy to make an economic
../data/lines/e07/e07-086/e07-086-01.png: comparison between clay pots and the various
../data/lines/e07/e07-086/e07-086-02.png: substitutes ; the former may last indefinitely
../data/lines/e07/e07-086/e07-086-03.png: with luck , while the latter are often
../data/lines/e07/e07-086/e07-086-04.png: expendable used only once . Clay pots are
../data/lines/e07/e07-086/e07-086-05.png: efficient and congenial containers in which
../data/lines/e07/e07-086/e07-086-06.png: to grow plants . In their proper setting they
../data/lines/e07/e07-086/e07-086-07.png: are not unattractive and , in spite of
../data/lines/e07/e07-090/e07-090-00.png: Present-day pots are better finished , do
../data/lines/e07/e07-090/e07-090-01.png: not get dirty so readily and are easier to
../data/lines/e07/e07-090/e07-090-02.png: wash . The deep rims make for neater and
../data/lines/e07/e07-090/e07-090-03.png: safer stacking , though they are still
../data/lines/e07/e07-090/e07-090-04.png: expensive and still get broken . On the
../data/lines/e07/e07-090/e07-090-05.png: other hand , there is really no replacement
../data/lines/e07/e07-090/e07-090-06.png: for the larger sizes , so they have the
../data/lines/e07/e07-090/e07-090-07.png: decided advantage of being the only
../data/lines/e07/e07-094/e07-094-00.png: Soil blocks are probably the oldest alternative to clay
../data/lines/e07/e07-094/e07-094-01.png: pots for plant raising . These are compressed blocks of
../data/lines/e07/e07-094/e07-094-02.png: compost , made in a specially devised press to
../data/lines/e07/e07-094/e07-094-03.png: simulate roughly the shape and size of a pot .
../data/lines/e07/e07-094/e07-094-04.png: Usually cylindrical or hexagonal in shape , they
../data/lines/e07/e07-094/e07-094-05.png: are made of the same compost as would have
../data/lines/e07/e07-094/e07-094-06.png: been used in a pot , the # only difference being
../data/lines/e07/e07-094/e07-094-07.png: that it is used in a slightly moister
../data/lines/e07/e07-098/e07-098-00.png: Seed is sown , or seedlings are pricked out into them
../data/lines/e07/e07-098/e07-098-01.png: in the normal way , the only real difference
../data/lines/e07/e07-098/e07-098-02.png: being that more of the watering is done through a
../data/lines/e07/e07-098/e07-098-03.png: rose to avoid breaking the blocks with a spout
../data/lines/e07/e07-098/e07-098-04.png: of water . First-class plants of tomatoes ,
../data/lines/e07/e07-098/e07-098-06.png: celery and onions , may all be raised in soil
../data/lines/e07/e07-098/e07-098-07.png: blocks ; so can such flowering plants as
../data/lines/e07/e07-101/e07-101-00.png: One big advantage of soil blocks is an obvious
../data/lines/e07/e07-101/e07-101-01.png: one : the cost of a pot of any description is saved
../data/lines/e07/e07-101/e07-101-02.png: completely . Manufacturing the block and planting
../data/lines/e07/e07-101/e07-101-03.png: it is very little more trouble than normal potting ,
../data/lines/e07/e07-101/e07-101-04.png: and a superior plant , which transplants more
../data/lines/e07/e07-101/e07-101-05.png: easily , is produced . The obvious limitation #
../data/lines/e07/e07-101/e07-101-06.png: is that soil blocks can only be used for
../data/lines/e07/e07-101/e07-101-07.png: propagating ; there can be no progression to a
../data/lines/e07/e07-101/e07-101-08.png: larger block when the plant or seedling is ready
../data/lines/e07/e07-101/e07-101-09.png: to be moved ; it must be planted out or
../data/lines/e07/e07-105/e07-105-00.png: Many amateur gardeners might improve their
../data/lines/e07/e07-105/e07-105-01.png: results by buying a small hand-operated soil
../data/lines/e07/e07-105/e07-105-02.png: block maker and use the money saved on
../data/lines/e07/e07-105/e07-105-03.png: buying small pots to improve their composts .
../data/lines/e07/e07-105/e07-105-04.png: The various types of small paper pots are very
../data/lines/e07/e07-105/e07-105-05.png: useful for short-term operations , but are
../data/lines/e07/e07-105/e07-105-06.png: inclined to collapse if the plants are in them
../data/lines/e07/e07-108/e07-108-00.png: They are # quite useful for plants that are
../data/lines/e07/e07-108/e07-108-01.png: despatched to market or direct to customers ,
../data/lines/e07/e07-108/e07-108-02.png: their cheapness making them attractive to the
../data/lines/e07/e07-108/e07-108-03.png: nurseryman ; there is also considerable saving
../data/lines/e07/e07-108/e07-108-04.png: in carriage costs because of their lightness .
../data/lines/e07/e07-108/e07-108-05.png: There are many types of plastic pots available ;
../data/lines/e07/e07-108/e07-108-06.png: some expensive , some quite cheap ; some good
../data/lines/e07/e07-108/e07-108-07.png: and others not so good . A wide range of
../data/lines/e07/e07-108/e07-108-08.png: plants grow quite well in plastic pots and
../data/lines/e07/e07-108/e07-108-09.png: usually need less water than those in clay
../data/lines/e07/e07-112/e07-112-00.png: They are slightly more difficult to
../data/lines/e07/e07-112/e07-112-01.png: manage , however , until a little experience
../data/lines/e07/e07-112/e07-112-02.png: has been gained with them . Plastic pots
../data/lines/e07/e07-112/e07-112-03.png: are usually more expensive than clay ones ,
../data/lines/e07/e07-112/e07-112-04.png: but they are almost indestructible and
../data/lines/e07/e07-112/e07-112-05.png: will last a long time with normal care .
../data/lines/f01/f01-053/f01-053-00.png: The job of the teacher is to set the learner's
../data/lines/f01/f01-053/f01-053-01.png: vocabulary to work on the existing store
../data/lines/f01/f01-053/f01-053-02.png: so as to make it grow . He does not
../data/lines/f01/f01-053/f01-053-03.png: simply pack new things into the store .
../data/lines/f01/f01-053/f01-053-04.png: The solitary learner has to find out
../data/lines/f01/f01-053/f01-053-05.png: how to do this for himself , with the help
../data/lines/f01/f01-053/f01-053-06.png: of books . He uses his vocabulary to
../data/lines/f01/f01-053/f01-053-07.png: ask questions and uses the books to
../data/lines/f01/f01-058/f01-058-00.png: Thus learning how to learn means becoming
../data/lines/f01/f01-058/f01-058-01.png: your own philosopher , your own psychologist
../data/lines/f01/f01-058/f01-058-02.png: and your own teacher . You will then be
../data/lines/f01/f01-058/f01-058-03.png: a well-established learner and the world
../data/lines/f01/f01-058/f01-058-04.png: will be at your feet . Although the word
../data/lines/f01/f01-058/f01-058-05.png: " mind " has given rise to endless
../data/lines/f01/f01-058/f01-058-07.png: logists , many of whom would like to
../data/lines/f01/f01-058/f01-058-08.png: abolish it from the dictionary , most
../data/lines/f01/f01-058/f01-058-09.png: of us obstinately go on using it .
../data/lines/f01/f01-066/f01-066-00.png: And then you get a knock on the head and all evidence of
../data/lines/f01/f01-066/f01-066-01.png: " mind " vanishes , at any rate for some time . It seems very difficult
../data/lines/f01/f01-066/f01-066-02.png: to detach the mind from the brain , and all the biological ,
../data/lines/f01/f01-066/f01-066-03.png: surgical and pharmacological evidence points to a very
../data/lines/f01/f01-066/f01-066-04.png: close connection . There is a lot to be said for keeping the
../data/lines/f01/f01-066/f01-066-05.png: word " soul " to stand for what many believe to be the imperishable
../data/lines/f01/f01-066/f01-066-06.png: essence of a man which is supposed to persist apart from
../data/lines/f01/f01-066/f01-066-07.png: the body , and to reserve the more prosaic word " mind " for
../data/lines/f01/f01-066/f01-066-08.png: the basis of all those experiences and phenomena which
../data/lines/f01/f01-066/f01-066-09.png: are clearly associated with the brain .
../data/lines/f01/f01-070/f01-070-00.png: Can we now put forward any reasonably clear
../data/lines/f01/f01-070/f01-070-01.png: picture of this " basis " of mental phenomena ?
../data/lines/f01/f01-070/f01-070-02.png: The physicists have succeeded remarkably well ,
../data/lines/f01/f01-070/f01-070-03.png: with the atomic theory , in giving a clear and detailed
../data/lines/f01/f01-070/f01-070-04.png: picture of the basis of such material phenomena
../data/lines/f01/f01-070/f01-070-05.png: as chemical action , magnetism , the behaviour of
../data/lines/f01/f01-070/f01-070-06.png: gases and so on . Where has psychology got to in its
../data/lines/f01/f01-070/f01-070-07.png: theories of " mind " ? Are there any ultimate units
../data/lines/f01/f01-070/f01-070-08.png: of mind akin to the atoms of matter ?
../data/lines/f01/f01-075/f01-075-00.png: At one time it was thought that mind could indeed
../data/lines/f01/f01-075/f01-075-01.png: be analysed into discrete bits . These bits were
../data/lines/f01/f01-075/f01-075-02.png: identified as elementary sensations . These were
../data/lines/f01/f01-075/f01-075-03.png: thought to combine together to form compound
../data/lines/f01/f01-075/f01-075-04.png: experiences by analogy with the way atoms of
../data/lines/f01/f01-075/f01-075-05.png: matter combine to form molecular compounds .
../data/lines/f01/f01-075/f01-075-06.png: But this view led to too many difficulties and
../data/lines/f01/f01-075/f01-075-07.png: was finally abandoned . Nevertheless the search
../data/lines/f01/f01-075/f01-075-08.png: for basic units of mind has gone on and will
../data/lines/f01/f01-075/f01-075-09.png: doubtless continue , for it is the aim of science to
../data/lines/f01/f01-081/f01-081-00.png: We must beware , however , of supposing that there must be any
../data/lines/f01/f01-081/f01-081-01.png: close analogy between the units of quite different
../data/lines/f01/f01-081/f01-081-02.png: sciences . For example the success of the atomic theory
../data/lines/f01/f01-081/f01-081-03.png: in physics might lead us to suppose that the ultimate
../data/lines/f01/f01-081/f01-081-04.png: units of geometry must be points . It would be more
../data/lines/f01/f01-081/f01-081-05.png: correct to regard operations as the ultimate units of
../data/lines/f01/f01-085/f01-085-00.png: There have been many conflicting tendencies in
../data/lines/f01/f01-085/f01-085-01.png: psychology in its search for ultimate units and here
../data/lines/f01/f01-085/f01-085-02.png: we can only indicate what seems to be the most promising
../data/lines/f01/f01-085/f01-085-03.png: concept which is current today . It is known as the schema .
../data/lines/f01/f01-085/f01-085-04.png: It is not an easy concept and if I try to make it
../data/lines/f01/f01-085/f01-085-05.png: concrete it will be at the cost of over-simplification
../data/lines/f01/f01-085/f01-085-06.png: but even so it may be better than a meaningless abstraction .
../data/lines/f01/f01-135/f01-135-00.png: It is the tendency to get things
../data/lines/f01/f01-135/f01-135-01.png: the wrong way round . As a
../data/lines/f01/f01-135/f01-135-08.png: usually boils down to a quite
../data/lines/f01/f01-139/f01-139-00.png: This is what I mean by " getting things the wrong way
../data/lines/f01/f01-139/f01-139-01.png: round " . He is far more likely to find out about how
../data/lines/f01/f01-139/f01-139-02.png: his own mind works by looking at other people's .
../data/lines/f01/f01-139/f01-139-03.png: For although looking inwards ( or " introspecting "
../data/lines/f01/f01-139/f01-139-04.png: as it is called ) , is not entirely ruled out ,
../data/lines/f01/f01-139/f01-139-05.png: nowadays most psychologists would agree that it is
../data/lines/f01/f01-139/f01-139-06.png: one of the most unreliable methods of getting
../data/lines/f01/f01-143/f01-143-00.png: And so they prefer objective methods . Since they cannot
../data/lines/f01/f01-143/f01-143-01.png: directly look into the mental processes of another
../data/lines/f01/f01-143/f01-143-02.png: person they observe his visible behaviour and then try
../data/lines/f01/f01-143/f01-143-03.png: to give theoretical interpretations of what lies behind
../data/lines/f01/f01-143/f01-143-04.png: this behaviour . This is no more queer than the method
../data/lines/f01/f01-143/f01-143-05.png: of the doctor who observes signs , and records symptoms ,
../data/lines/f01/f01-143/f01-143-06.png: and diagnoses the inner states responsible for them .
../data/lines/f01/f01-147/f01-147-00.png: He may never have had the disease himself but he
../data/lines/f01/f01-147/f01-147-01.png: can nevertheless identify it . Similarly the psychologist has
../data/lines/f01/f01-147/f01-147-02.png: to be prepared to observe and make inferences about
../data/lines/f01/f01-147/f01-147-03.png: all kinds of processes in other people , whether or not they
../data/lines/f01/f01-147/f01-147-04.png: correspond with anything in his own experience . We know
../data/lines/f01/f01-147/f01-147-05.png: very little about the patterns of brain-activity which
../data/lines/f01/f01-147/f01-147-06.png: provide our schemas , nor do we need to know as far as
../data/lines/f01/f01-147/f01-147-07.png: psychology is concerned - these patterns are the concern of
../data/lines/f02/f02-000/f02-000-00.png: The numerically largest group , consisting of male
../data/lines/f02/f02-000/f02-000-01.png: weekly wage-earners up to chargehand level
../data/lines/f02/f02-000/f02-000-02.png: and in the works only , excluding the offices , was
../data/lines/f02/f02-000/f02-000-03.png: therefore selected . A detailed age-structure was
../data/lines/f02/f02-000/f02-000-05.png: revealing that there were ( at that time ) seven-
../data/lines/f02/f02-000/f02-000-06.png: teen men seventy years of age or older ,
../data/lines/f02/f02-000/f02-000-07.png: thirty-three aged sixty-four years , and sixty-
../data/lines/f02/f02-000/f02-000-08.png: five just fifty years of age .
../data/lines/f02/f02-003/f02-003-00.png: A small panel was formed , not on a formally representative
../data/lines/f02/f02-003/f02-003-01.png: basis but rather of energetic and concerned individuals ,
../data/lines/f02/f02-003/f02-003-02.png: from various levels in the firm . In due course
../data/lines/f02/f02-003/f02-003-03.png: the panel decided to seek further insight into the
../data/lines/f02/f02-003/f02-003-04.png: problems faced by older workers , and approached
../data/lines/f02/f02-003/f02-003-05.png: those seventy years of age or older .
../data/lines/f02/f02-017/f02-017-00.png: The Rubery , Owen scheme is now in its
../data/lines/f02/f02-017/f02-017-01.png: fourth year , and opportunity has been taken
../data/lines/f02/f02-017/f02-017-02.png: to revise the course in the light of
